GV01rv_06_u:0: RV_06.001.01.1{35} tvaṃ hyagne prathamo manotāsyā dhiyo abhavo dasma hotā
GV01rv_06_u:1: RV_06.001.01.2{35} tvaṃ sīṃ vṛṣannakṛṇorduṣṭarītu saho viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:2: RV_06.001.02.1{35} adhā hotā nyasīdo yajīyāniḷas pada iṣayannīḍyaḥ san
GV01rv_06_u:3: RV_06.001.02.2{35} taṃ tvā naraḥ prathamaṃ devayanto maho rāye citayanto anu gman
GV01rv_06_u:4: RV_06.001.03.1{35} vṛteva yantaṃ bahubhirvasavyaistve rayiṃ jāgṛvāṃso anu gman
GV01rv_06_u:5: RV_06.001.03.2{35} ruśantamagniṃ darśataṃ bṛhantaṃ vapāvantaṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam
GV01rv_06_u:6: RV_06.001.04.1{35} padaṃ devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śrava āpannamṛktam
GV01rv_06_u:7: RV_06.001.04.2{35} nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyāṃ te raṇayantasandṛṣṭau
GV01rv_06_u:8: RV_06.001.05.1{35} tvāṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tvāṃ rāya ubhayāso janānām
GV01rv_06_u:9: RV_06.001.05.2{35} tvaṃ trātā taraṇe cetyo bhūḥ pitā mātā sadamin mānuṣāṇām
GV01rv_06_u:10: RV_06.001.06.1{36} saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyo vikṣvagnirhotā mandro ni ṣasādā yajīyān
GV01rv_06_u:11: RV_06.001.06.2{36} taṃ tvā vayaṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsamupa jñubādho namasā sadema
GV01rv_06_u:12: RV_06.001.07.1{36} taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudhyo navyamagne-sumnāyava īmahe devayantaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:13: RV_06.001.07.2{36} tvaṃ viśo anayo dīdyāno divo agne bṛhatā rocanena
GV01rv_06_u:14: RV_06.001.08.1{36} viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatiṃ śaśvatīnāṃ nitośanaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
GV01rv_06_u:15: RV_06.001.08.2{36} pretīṣaṇimiṣayantaṃ pāvakaṃ rājantamagniṃ yajataṃ rayīṇām
GV01rv_06_u:16: RV_06.001.09.1{36} so agna īje śaśame ca marto yasta ānaṭ samidhā havyadātim
GV01rv_06_u:17: RV_06.001.09.2{36} ya āhutiṃ pari vedā namobhirviśvet sa vāmā dadhatetvotaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:18: RV_06.001.10.1{36} asmā u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhiragne samidhota havyaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:19: RV_06.001.10.2{36} vedī sūno sahaso gīrbhirukthairā te bhadrāyāṃ sumatauyatema
GV01rv_06_u:20: RV_06.001.11.1{36} ā yastatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiśca śravasyastarutraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:21: RV_06.001.11.2{36} bṛhadbhirvājai sthavirebhirasme revadbhiragne vitaraṃ vi bhāhi
GV01rv_06_u:22: RV_06.001.12.1{36} nṛvad vaso sadamid dhehyasme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:23: RV_06.001.12.2{36} pūrvīriṣo bṛhatīrāreaghā asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu
GV01rv_06_u:24: RV_06.001.13.1{36} purūṇyagne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasutā te aśyām
GV01rv_06_u:25: RV_06.001.13.2{36} purūṇi hi tve puruvāra santyagne vasu vidhate rājani tve
GV01rv_06_u:26: RV_06.002.01.1{01} tvaṃ hi kṣaitavad yaśo 'gne mitro na patyase
GV01rv_06_u:27: RV_06.002.01.2{01} tvaṃ vicarṣaṇe śravo vaso puṣṭiṃ na puṣyasi
GV01rv_06_u:28: RV_06.002.02.1{01} tvāṃ hi ṣmā carṣaṇayo yajñebhirgīrbhirīḷate
GV01rv_06_u:30: RV_06.002.03.1{01} sajoṣastvā divo naro yajñasya ketumindhate
GV01rv_06_u:31: RV_06.002.03.2{01} yad dha sya mānuṣo janaḥ sumnāyurjuhve adhvare
GV01rv_06_u:32: RV_06.002.04.1{01} ṛdhad yaste sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate
GV01rv_06_u:33: RV_06.002.04.2{01} ūtī ṣa bṛhato divo dviṣo aṃho na tarati
GV01rv_06_u:34: RV_06.002.05.1{01} samidhā yasta āhutiṃ niśitiṃ martyo naśat
GV01rv_06_u:36: RV_06.002.06.1{02} tveṣaste dhūma ṛṇvati divi ṣañchukra ātataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:37: RV_06.002.06.2{02} sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase
GV01rv_06_u:38: RV_06.002.07.1{02} adhā hi vikṣvīḍyo 'si priyo no atithiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:39: RV_06.002.07.2{02} raṇvaḥ purīva jūryaḥ sūnurna trayayāyyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:40: RV_06.002.08.1{02} kratvā hi droṇe ajyase 'gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:41: RV_06.002.08.2{02} parijmevasvadhā gayo 'tyo na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:42: RV_06.002.09.1{02} tvaṃ tyā cidacyutāgne paśurna yavase
GV01rv_06_u:43: RV_06.002.09.2{02} dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:44: RV_06.002.10.1{02} veṣi hyadhvarīyatāmagne hotā dame viśām
GV01rv_06_u:45: RV_06.002.10.2{02} samṛdho viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyamaṅgiraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:46: RV_06.002.11.1{02} achā no mitramaho deva devānagne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:47: RV_06.002.11.2{02} vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritātarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema
GV01rv_06_u:48: RV_06.003.01.1{03} agne sa kṣeṣad ṛtapā ṛtejā uru jyotirnaśate devayuṣ ṭe
GV01rv_06_u:49: RV_06.003.01.2{03} yaṃ tvaṃ mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣā deva pāsi tyajasā martamaṃhaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:50: RV_06.003.02.1{03} īje yajñebhih śaśame śamībhirṛdhadvārāyāgnaye dadāśa
GV01rv_06_u:51: RV_06.003.02.2{03} evā cana taṃ yaśasāmajuṣṭirnāṃho martaṃ naśate na pradṛptiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:52: RV_06.003.03.1{03} sūro na yasya dṛśatirarepā bhīmā yadeti śucatasta ā dhīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:53: RV_06.003.03.2{03} heṣasvataḥ śurudho nāyamaktoḥ kutrā cid raṇvo vasatirvanejāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:54: RV_06.003.04.1{03} tigmaṃ cidema mahi varpo asya bhasadaśvo na yamasāna āsā
GV01rv_06_u:55: RV_06.003.04.2{03} vijehamānaḥ paraśurna jihvāṃ dravirna drāvayati dāru dhakṣat
GV01rv_06_u:56: RV_06.003.05.1{03} sa idasteva prati dhādasiṣyañchiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām
GV01rv_06_u:58: RV_06.003.06.1{04} sa īṃ rebho na prati vasta usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitramahāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:59: RV_06.003.06.2{04} naktaṃ ya īmaruṣo yo divā nṝnamartyo aruṣo yo divā nṝn
GV01rv_06_u:60: RV_06.003.07.1{04} divo na yasya vidhato navīnod vṛṣā rukṣa oṣadhīṣu nūnot
GV01rv_06_u:61: RV_06.003.07.2{04} ghṛṇā na yo dhrajasā patmanā yannā rodasī vasunādaṃ supatnī
GV01rv_06_u:62: RV_06.003.08.1{04} dhāyobhirvā yo yujyebhirarkairvidyun na davidyot svebhiḥśuṣmaih
GV01rv_06_u:63: RV_06.003.08.2{04} śardho vā yo marutāṃ tatakṣa ṛbhurna tveṣorabhasāno adyaut
GV01rv_06_u:64: RV_06.004.01.1{05} yathā hotarmanuṣo devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajāsi
GV01rv_06_u:65: RV_06.004.01.2{05} evā no adya samanā samānānuśannagna uśato yakṣi devān
GV01rv_06_u:66: RV_06.004.02.1{05} sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇirna vastoragnirvandāru vedyaścano dhāt
GV01rv_06_u:68: RV_06.004.03.1{05} dyāvo na yasya panayantyabhvaṃ bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryo na śukraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:69: RV_06.004.03.2{05} vi ya inotyajaraḥ pāvako 'śnasya cicchiśnathat pūrvyāṇi
GV01rv_06_u:70: RV_06.004.04.1{05} vadmā hi sūno asyadmasadvā cakre agnirjanuṣājmānnam
GV01rv_06_u:71: RV_06.004.04.2{05} sa tvaṃ na ūrjasana ūrjaṃ dhā rājeva jeravṛke kṣeṣyantaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:72: RV_06.004.05.1{05} nitikti yo vāraṇamannamatti vāyurna rāṣṭryatyetyaktūn
GV01rv_06_u:73: RV_06.004.05.2{05} turyāma yasta ādiśāmarātīratyo na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut
GV01rv_06_u:74: RV_06.004.06.1{06} ā sūryo na bhānumadbhirarkairagne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā
GV01rv_06_u:75: RV_06.004.06.2{06} citro nayat pari tamāṃsyaktaḥ śociṣā patmannauśijo na dīyan
GV01rv_06_u:76: RV_06.004.07.1{06} tvāṃ hi mandratamamarkaśokairvavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣyagne
GV01rv_06_u:77: RV_06.004.07.2{06} indraṃ na tvā śavasā devatā vāyuṃ pṛṇanti rādhasānṛtamāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:78: RV_06.004.08.1{06} nū no agne 'vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣyaṃhaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:79: RV_06.004.08.2{06} tā sūribhyo gṛṇate rāsi sumnaṃ madema śatahimāḥsuvīrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:80: RV_06.005.01.1{07} huve vaḥ sūnuṃ sahaso yuvānamadroghavācaṃ matibhiryaviṣṭham
GV01rv_06_u:81: RV_06.005.01.2{07} ya invati draviṇāni pracetā viśvavārāṇi puruvāroadhruk
GV01rv_06_u:82: RV_06.005.02.1{07} tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotardoṣā vastorerire yajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:83: RV_06.005.02.2{07} kṣāmeva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin saṃ saubhagāni dadhirepāvake
GV01rv_06_u:84: RV_06.005.03.1{07} tvaṃ vikṣu pradivaḥ sīda āsu kratvā rathīrabhavo vāryāṇām
GV01rv_06_u:85: RV_06.005.03.2{07} ata inoṣi vidhate cikitvo vyānuṣag jātavedo vasūni
GV01rv_06_u:86: RV_06.005.04.1{07} yo naḥ sanutyo abhidāsadagne yo antaro mitramaho vanuṣyāt
GV01rv_06_u:87: RV_06.005.04.2{07} tamajarebhirvṛṣabhistava svaistapā tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān
GV01rv_06_u:88: RV_06.005.05.1{07} yaste yajñena samidhā ya ukthairarkebhiḥ sūno sahaso dadāśat
GV01rv_06_u:89: RV_06.005.05.2{07} sa martyeṣvamṛta pracetā rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti
GV01rv_06_u:90: RV_06.005.06.1{07} sa tat kṛdhīṣitastūyamagne spṛdho bādhasva sahasā sahasvān
GV01rv_06_u:91: RV_06.005.06.2{07} yacchasyase dyubhirakto vacobhistajjuṣasva jariturghoṣi manma
GV01rv_06_u:92: RV_06.005.07.1{07} aśyāma taṃ kāmamagne tavotī aśyāma rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīram
GV01rv_06_u:93: RV_06.005.07.2{07} aśyāma vājamabhi vājayanto 'śyāma dyumnamajarājaraṃ te
GV01rv_06_u:94: RV_06.006.01.1{08} pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnumachā yajñena gātumava ichamānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:95: RV_06.006.01.2{08} vṛścadvanaṃ kṛṣṇayāmaṃ ruśantaṃ vītī hotārandivyaṃ jigāti
GV01rv_06_u:97: RV_06.006.02.2{08} yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūnyagniranuyāti bharvan
GV01rv_06_u:98: RV_06.006.03.1{08} vi te viṣvag vātajūtāso agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaścaranti
GV01rv_06_u:99: RV_06.006.03.2{08} tuvimrakṣāso divyā navagvā vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:100: RV_06.006.04.1{08} ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmaḥ kṣāṃ vapanti viṣitāso aśvāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:101: RV_06.006.04.2{08} adha bhramasta urviyā vi bhāti yātayamāno adhi sānu pṛśneḥ
GV01rv_06_u:102: RV_06.006.05.1{08} adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇo goṣuyudho nāśaniḥ sṛjānā
GV01rv_06_u:103: RV_06.006.05.2{08} śūrasyeva prasitiḥ kṣātiragnerdurvarturbhīmo dayate vanāni
GV01rv_06_u:104: RV_06.006.06.1{08} ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahastodasya dhṛṣatā tatantha
GV01rv_06_u:105: RV_06.006.06.2{08} sa bādhasvāpa bhayā sahobhi spṛdho vanuṣyan vanuṣo ni jūrva
GV01rv_06_u:106: RV_06.006.07.1{08} sa citra citraṃ citayantamasme citrakṣatra citratamaṃ vayodhām
GV01rv_06_u:107: RV_06.006.07.2{08} candraṃ rayiṃ puruvīraṃ bṛhantaṃ candra candrābhirgṛṇate yuvasva
GV01rv_06_u:108: RV_06.007.01.1{09} mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyā vaiśvānaram ṛta ā jātamagnim
GV01rv_06_u:109: RV_06.007.01.2{09} kaviṃ samrājamatithiṃ janānāmāsannā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:110: RV_06.007.02.1{09} nābhiṃ yajñānāṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇāṃ mahāmāhāvamabhisaṃ navanta
GV01rv_06_u:111: RV_06.007.02.2{09} vaiśvānaraṃ rathyamadhvarāṇāṃ yajñasya ketuṃ janayanta devāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:112: RV_06.007.03.1{09} tvad vipro jāyate vājyagne tvad vīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:113: RV_06.007.03.2{09} vaiśvānara tvamasmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi
GV01rv_06_u:114: RV_06.007.04.1{09} tvāṃ viśve amṛta jāyamānaṃ śiśuṃ na devā abhi saṃ navante
GV01rv_06_u:115: RV_06.007.04.2{09} tava kratubhiramṛtatvamāyan vaiśvānara yat pitroradīdeḥ
GV01rv_06_u:116: RV_06.007.05.1{09} vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahānyagne nakirā dadharṣa
GV01rv_06_u:118: RV_06.007.06.1{09} vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divo amṛtasya ketunā
GV01rv_06_u:119: RV_06.007.06.2{09} tasyedu viśvā bhuvanādhi mūrdhani vayā iva ruruhuḥsapta visruhaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:120: RV_06.007.07.1{09} vi yo rajāṃsyamimīta sukraturvaiśvānaro vi divo rocanā kaviḥ
GV01rv_06_u:121: RV_06.007.07.2{09} pari yo viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe 'dabdho gopā amṛtasya rakṣitā
GV01rv_06_u:122: RV_06.008.01.1{10} pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇo aruṣasya nū sahaḥ pra nu vocaṃ vidathājātavedasaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:123: RV_06.008.01.2{10} vaiśvānarāya matirnavyasī śuciḥ soma ivapavate cāruragnaye
GV01rv_06_u:124: RV_06.008.02.1{10} sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratānyagnirvratapā arakṣata
GV01rv_06_u:126: RV_06.008.03.1{10} vyastabhnād rodasī mitro adbhuto 'ntarvāvadakṛṇojjyotiṣā tamaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:127: RV_06.008.03.2{10} vi carmaṇīva dhiṣaṇe avartayad vaiśvānaro viśvamadhatta vṛṣṇyam
GV01rv_06_u:128: RV_06.008.04.1{10} apāmupasthe mahiṣā agṛbhṇata viśo rājānamupa tasthurṛgmiyam
GV01rv_06_u:129: RV_06.008.04.2{10} ā dūto agnimabharad vivasvato vaiśvānaraṃ mātariśvā parāvataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:130: RV_06.008.05.1{10} yuge-yuge vidathyaṃ gṛṇadbhyo 'gne rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehi navyasīm
GV01rv_06_u:131: RV_06.008.05.2{10} pavyeva rājannaghaśaṃsamajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninaṃ na tejasā
GV01rv_06_u:132: RV_06.008.06.1{10} asmākamagne maghavatsu dhārayānāmi kṣatramajaraṃ suvīryam
GV01rv_06_u:133: RV_06.008.06.2{10} vayaṃ jayema śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vaiśvānara vājamagne tavotibhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:134: RV_06.008.07.1{10} adabdhebhistava gopābhiriṣṭe 'smākaṃ pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn
GV01rv_06_u:135: RV_06.008.07.2{10} rakṣā ca no daduṣāṃ śardho agne vaiśvānara pra catārī stavānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:136: RV_06.009.01.1{11} ahaśca kṛṣṇamahararjunaṃ ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:138: RV_06.009.02.1{11} nāhaṃ tantuṃ na vi jānāmyotuṃ na yaṃ vayanti samare'tamānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:139: RV_06.009.02.2{11} kasya svit putra iha vaktvāni paro vadātyavareṇa pitrā
GV01rv_06_u:140: RV_06.009.03.1{11} sa it tantuṃ sa vi jānātyotuṃ sa vaktvāny ṛtuthā vadāti
GV01rv_06_u:141: RV_06.009.03.2{11} ya īṃ ciketadamṛtasya gopā avaścaran paro anyena paśyan
GV01rv_06_u:142: RV_06.009.04.1{11} ayaṃ hotā prathamaḥ paśyatemamidaṃ jyotiramṛtaṃ martyeṣu
GV01rv_06_u:143: RV_06.009.04.2{11} ayaṃ sa jajñe dhruva ā niṣatto 'martyastanvā vardhamānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:144: RV_06.009.05.1{11} dhruvaṃ jyotirnihitaṃ dṛśaye kaṃ mano javiṣṭhaṃ patayatsvantaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:145: RV_06.009.05.2{11} viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ saketā ekaṃ kratumabhivi yanti sādhu
GV01rv_06_u:146: RV_06.009.06.1{11} vi me karṇā patayato vi cakṣurvīdaṃ jyotirhṛdaya āhitaṃ yat
GV01rv_06_u:147: RV_06.009.06.2{11} vi me manaścarati dūraādhīḥ kiṃ svid vakṣyāmikimu nū maniṣye
GV01rv_06_u:148: RV_06.009.07.1{11} viśve devā anamasyan bhiyānāstvāmagne tamasi tasthivāṃsam
GV01rv_06_u:150: RV_06.010.01.1{12} puro vo mandraṃ divyaṃ suvṛktiṃ prayati yajñe agnimadhvaredadhidhvam
GV01rv_06_u:151: RV_06.010.01.2{12} pura ukthebhiḥ sa hi no vibhāvā svadhvarā karati jātavedāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:152: RV_06.010.02.1{12} tamu dyumaḥ purvaṇīka hotaragne agnibhirmanuṣa idhānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:153: RV_06.010.02.2{12} stomaṃ yamasmai mamateva śūṣaṃ ghṛtaṃ na śuci matayaḥ pavante
GV01rv_06_u:154: RV_06.010.03.1{12} pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yo agnaye dadāśa vipra ukthaiḥ

GV01rv_06_u:353: RV_06.017.05.2{01} mahāmadriṃ pari gā indra santaṃ nutthā acyutaṃ sadasas pari svāt
GV01rv_06_u:354: RV_06.017.06.1{02} tava kratvā tava tad daṃsanābhirāmāsu pakvaṃ śacyā ni dīdhaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:355: RV_06.017.06.2{02} aurṇordura usriyābhyo vi dṛḷhodūrvād gā asṛjo aṅgirasvān
GV01rv_06_u:356: RV_06.017.07.1{02} paprātha kṣāṃ mahi daṇso vyurvīmupa dyām ṛṣvo bṛhadindra stabhāyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:357: RV_06.017.07.2{02} adhārayo rodasī devaputre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya
GV01rv_06_u:358: RV_06.017.08.1{02} adha tvā viśve pura indra devā ekaṃ tavasaṃ dadhire bharāya
GV01rv_06_u:359: RV_06.017.08.2{02} adevo yadabhyauhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇata indramatra
GV01rv_06_u:360: RV_06.017.09.1{02} adha dyauścit te apa sā nu vajrād dvitānamad bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:361: RV_06.017.09.2{02} ahiṃ yadindro abhyohasānaṃ ni cid viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna
GV01rv_06_u:362: RV_06.017.10.1{02} adha tvaṣṭā te maha ugra vajraṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ vavṛtacchatāśrim
GV01rv_06_u:363: RV_06.017.10.2{02} nikāmamaramaṇasaṃ yena navantamahiṃ saṃ piṇagṛjīṣin
GV01rv_06_u:364: RV_06.017.11.1{03} vardhān yaṃ viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacacchataṃ mahiṣānindra tubhyam
GV01rv_06_u:365: RV_06.017.11.2{03} pūṣā viṣṇustrīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtrahaṇaṃ madiramaṃśumasmai
GV01rv_06_u:366: RV_06.017.12.1{03} ā kṣodo mahi vṛtaṃ nadīnāṃ pariṣṭhitamasṛja ūrmimapām
GV01rv_06_u:367: RV_06.017.12.2{03} tāsāmanu pravata indra panthāṃ prārdayo nīcīrapasaḥ samudram
GV01rv_06_u:368: RV_06.017.13.1{03} evā tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsamindraṃ mahāmugramajuryaṃ sahodām
GV01rv_06_u:369: RV_06.017.13.2{03} suvīraṃ tvā svāyudhaṃ suvajramā brahma navyamavase vavṛtyāt
GV01rv_06_u:370: RV_06.017.14.1{03} sa no vājāya śravasa iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumata indra viprān
GV01rv_06_u:371: RV_06.017.14.2{03} bharadvāje nṛvata indra sūrīn divi ca smaidhi pārye na indra
GV01rv_06_u:372: RV_06.017.15.1{03} ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:373: RV_06.018.01.1{04} tamu ṣṭuhi yo abhibhūtyojā vanvannavātaḥ puruhūta indraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:375: RV_06.018.02.1{04} sa yudhmaḥ satvā khajakṛt samadvā tuvimrakṣo nadanumān ṛjīṣī
GV01rv_06_u:377: RV_06.018.03.1{04} tvaṃ ha nu tyadadamāyo dasyūnrekaḥ kṛṣṭīravanorāryāya
GV01rv_06_u:378: RV_06.018.03.2{04} asti svin nu vīryaṃ tat ta indra na svidasti tad ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:379: RV_06.018.04.1{04} sadid dhi te tuvijātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turatasturasya
GV01rv_06_u:381: RV_06.018.05.1{04} tan naḥ pratnaṃ sakhyamastu yuṣme itthā vadadbhirvalamaṅgirobhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:382: RV_06.018.05.2{04} hannacyutacyud dasmeṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puro vi duroasya viśvāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:383: RV_06.018.06.1{05} sa hi dhībhirhavyo astyugra īśānakṛn mahati vṛtratūrye
GV01rv_06_u:384: RV_06.018.06.2{05} sa tokasātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyo abhavat samatsu
GV01rv_06_u:385: RV_06.018.07.1{05} sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇāmamartyena nāmnāti pra sarsre
GV01rv_06_u:386: RV_06.018.07.2{05} sa dyumnena sa śavasota rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:387: RV_06.018.08.1{05} sa yo na muhe na mithū jano bhūt sumantunāmā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca
GV01rv_06_u:388: RV_06.018.08.2{05} vṛṇak pipruṃ śambaraṃ śuṣṇamindraḥ purāṃcyautnāya śayathāya nū cit
GV01rv_06_u:389: RV_06.018.09.1{05} udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtrahatyāya rathamindra tiṣṭha
GV01rv_06_u:390: RV_06.018.09.2{05} dhiṣva vajraṃ hasta ā dakṣiṇatrābhi pra manda purudatra māyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:391: RV_06.018.10.1{05} agnirna śuṣkaṃ vanamindra hetī rakṣo ni dhakṣyaśanirna bhīmā
GV01rv_06_u:392: RV_06.018.10.2{05} gambhīraya ṛṣvayā yo rurojādhvānayad duritā dambhayacca
GV01rv_06_u:393: RV_06.018.11.1{06} ā sahasraṃ pathibhirindra rāyā tuvidyumna tuvivājebhirarvāk
GV01rv_06_u:394: RV_06.018.11.2{06} yāhi sūno sahaso yasya nū cidadeva īśe puruhūta yotoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:395: RV_06.018.12.1{06} pra tuvidyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣverdivo rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:396: RV_06.018.12.2{06} nāsya śatrurna pratimānamasti na pratiṣṭhiḥpurumāyasya sahyoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:397: RV_06.018.13.1{06} pra tat te adyā karaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhūt kutsaṃ yadāyumatithigvamasmai
GV01rv_06_u:398: RV_06.018.13.2{06} purū sahasrā ni śiśā abhi kṣāmut tūrvayāṇaṃ dhṛṣatā ninetha
GV01rv_06_u:399: RV_06.018.14.1{06} anu tvāhighne adha deva devā madan viśve kavitamaṃ kavīnām
GV01rv_06_u:400: RV_06.018.14.2{06} karo yatra varivo bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:401: RV_06.018.15.1{06} anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat ta ojo 'martyā jihata indra devāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:402: RV_06.018.15.2{06} kṛṣvā kṛtno akṛtaṃ yat te astyukthaṃ navīyo janayasva yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:403: RV_06.019.01.1{07} mahānindro nṛvadā carṣaṇiprā uta dvibarhā aminaḥ sahobhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:404: RV_06.019.01.2{07} asmadryag vāvṛdhe viryāyoruḥ pṛthuḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhirbhūt
GV01rv_06_u:405: RV_06.019.02.1{07} indrameva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhād bṛhantam ṛṣvamajaraṃ yuvānam
GV01rv_06_u:406: RV_06.019.02.2{07} aṣāḷhena savasā śūśuvāṃsaṃ sadyaścid yo vāvṛdhe asāmi
GV01rv_06_u:407: RV_06.019.03.1{07} pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak saṃ mimīhi śravāṃsi
GV01rv_06_u:408: RV_06.019.03.2{07} yūtheva paśvaḥ paśupā damūnā asmānindrābhyā vavṛtsvājau
GV01rv_06_u:409: RV_06.019.04.1{07} taṃ va indraṃ catinamasya śākairiha nūnaṃ vājayanto huvema
GV01rv_06_u:410: RV_06.019.04.2{07} yathā cit pūrve jaritāra āsuranedyā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:411: RV_06.019.05.1{07} dhṛtavrato dhanadāḥ somavṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:412: RV_06.019.05.2{07} saṃ jagmire pathyā rāyo asmin samudre na sindhavo yādamānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:413: RV_06.019.06.1{08} śaviṣṭhaṃ na ā bhara śūra śava ojiṣṭhamojo abhibhūtaugram
GV01rv_06_u:414: RV_06.019.06.2{08} viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇāmasmabhyaṃ dāharivo mādayadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:415: RV_06.019.07.1{08} yaste madaḥ pṛtaṇāṣāḷ amṛdhra indra taṃ na ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam
GV01rv_06_u:416: RV_06.019.07.2{08} yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsastvotāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:417: RV_06.019.08.1{08} ā no bhara vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmamindra dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam
GV01rv_06_u:418: RV_06.019.08.2{08} yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tavotibhiruta jāmīnrajāmīn
GV01rv_06_u:419: RV_06.019.09.1{08} ā te śuṣmo vṛṣabha etu paścādottarādadharādā purastāt
GV01rv_06_u:420: RV_06.019.09.2{08} ā viśvato abhi sametvarvāṃ indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehyasme
GV01rv_06_u:421: RV_06.019.10.1{08} nṛvat ta indra nṛtamābhirūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmaṃ śromatebhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:422: RV_06.019.10.2{08} īkṣe hi vasva ubhayasya rājan dhā ratnaṃ mahi sthūraṃ bṛhantam
GV01rv_06_u:424: RV_06.019.12.1{08} janaṃ vajrin mahi cin manyamānamebhyo nṛbhyo randhayā yeṣvasmi
GV01rv_06_u:425: RV_06.019.12.2{08} adhā hi tvā pṛthivyāṃ śūrasātau havāmahe tanayegoṣvapsu
GV01rv_06_u:426: RV_06.019.13.1{08} vayaṃ ta ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ-śatroruttara itsyāma
GV01rv_06_u:427: RV_06.019.13.2{08} ghnanto vṛtrāṇyubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatātvotāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:428: RV_06.020.01.1{09} dyaurna ya indrābhi bhūmāryastasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān
GV01rv_06_u:429: RV_06.020.01.2{09} taṃ naḥ sahasrabharamurvarāsāṃ daddhi sūno sahaso vṛtraturam
GV01rv_06_u:430: RV_06.020.02.1{09} divo na tubhyamanvindra satrāsuryaṃ devebhirdhāyi viśvam
GV01rv_06_u:431: RV_06.020.02.2{09} ahiṃ yad vṛtramapo vavrivāṃsaṃ hannṛjīṣin viṣṇunāsacānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:433: RV_06.020.03.2{09} rājābhavan madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsāṃ yat purāṃ dartnumāvat
GV01rv_06_u:434: RV_06.020.04.1{09} śatairapadran paṇaya indrātra daśoṇaye kavaye 'rkasātau
GV01rv_06_u:435: RV_06.020.04.2{09} vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasyāśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvo nārirecīt kiṃcana pra
GV01rv_06_u:436: RV_06.020.05.1{09} maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:437: RV_06.020.05.2{09} uru ṣa sarathaṃ sārathaye karindraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau
GV01rv_06_u:438: RV_06.020.06.1{10} pra śyeno na madiramaṃśumasmai śiro dāsasya namucermathāyan
GV01rv_06_u:439: RV_06.020.06.2{10} prāvan namīṃ sāpyaṃ sasantaṃ pṛṇag rāyā samiṣā saṃ svasti
GV01rv_06_u:440: RV_06.020.07.1{10} vi piprorahimāyasya dṛḷhāḥ puro vajriñchavasā na dardaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:441: RV_06.020.07.2{10} sudāman tad rekṇo apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātraṃ dāśuṣe dāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:442: RV_06.020.08.1{10} sa vetasuṃ daśamāyaṃ daśoṇiṃ tūtujimindraḥ svabhiṣṭisumnaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:443: RV_06.020.08.2{10} ā tugraṃ śaśvadibhaṃ dyotanāya māturna sīmupa sṛjā iyadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:444: RV_06.020.09.1{10} sa īṃ spṛdho vanate apratīto bibhrad vajraṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ gabhastau
GV01rv_06_u:445: RV_06.020.09.2{10} tiṣṭhad dharī adhyasteva garte vacoyujā vahata indram ṛṣvam
GV01rv_06_u:446: RV_06.020.10.1{10} sanema te 'vasā navya indra pra pūrava stavanta enā yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:447: RV_06.020.10.2{10} sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīrdard dhan dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan
GV01rv_06_u:448: RV_06.020.11.1{10} tvaṃ vṛdha indra pūrvyo bhūrvarivasyannuśane kāvyāya
GV01rv_06_u:449: RV_06.020.11.2{10} parā navavāstvamanudeyaṃ mahe pitre dadātha svaṃ napātam
GV01rv_06_u:451: RV_06.020.13.1{10} tava ha tyadindra viṣvamājau sasto dhunīcumurī yā ha siṣvap
GV01rv_06_u:452: RV_06.020.13.2{10} dīdayadit tubhyaṃ somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītiridhmabhṛtiḥ pakthyarkaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:453: RV_06.021.01.1{11} imā u tvā purutamasya kārorhavyaṃ vīra havyā havante
GV01rv_06_u:454: RV_06.021.01.2{11} dhiyo ratheṣṭhāmajaraṃ navīyo rayirvibhūtirīyate vacasyā
GV01rv_06_u:455: RV_06.021.02.1{11} tamu stuṣa indraṃ yo vidāno girvāhasaṃ gīrbhīryajñavṛddham
GV01rv_06_u:456: RV_06.021.02.2{11} yasya divamati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ purumāyasya riricemahitvam
GV01rv_06_u:457: RV_06.021.03.1{11} sa it tamo 'vayunaṃ tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavaccakāra
GV01rv_06_u:458: RV_06.021.03.2{11} kadā te martā amṛtasya dhāmeyakṣanto na minanti svadhāvaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:459: RV_06.021.04.1{11} yastā cakāra sa kuha svidindraḥ kamā janaṃ carati kāsu vikṣu
GV01rv_06_u:460: RV_06.021.04.2{11} kaste yajño manase śaṃ varāya ko arka indrakatamaḥ sa hotā
GV01rv_06_u:461: RV_06.021.05.1{11} idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsa āsuḥ purukṛt sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:462: RV_06.021.05.2{11} ye madhyamāsa uta nūtanāsa utāvamasya puruhūta bodhi
GV01rv_06_u:463: RV_06.021.06.1{12} taṃ pṛchanto 'varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā ta indra śrutyānu yemuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:464: RV_06.021.06.2{12} arcāmasi vīra brahmavāho yādeva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam
GV01rv_06_u:465: RV_06.021.07.1{12} abhi tvā pājo rakṣaso vi tasthe mahi jajñānamabhi tat su tiṣṭha
GV01rv_06_u:466: RV_06.021.07.2{12} tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apatā nudasva
GV01rv_06_u:467: RV_06.021.08.1{12} sa tu śrudhīndra nūtanasya brahmaṇyato vīra kārudhāyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:468: RV_06.021.08.2{12} tvaṃ hyāpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇāṃ śaśvad babhūtha suhava eṣṭau
GV01rv_06_u:469: RV_06.021.09.1{12} protaye varuṇaṃ mitramindraṃ marutaḥ kṛṣvāvase no adya
GV01rv_06_u:470: RV_06.021.09.2{12} pra pūṣaṇaṃ viṣṇumagniṃ purandhiṃ savitāramoṣadhīḥ parvatāṃśca
GV01rv_06_u:471: RV_06.021.10.1{12} ima u tvā puruśāka prayajyo jaritāro abhyarcantyarkaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:472: RV_06.021.10.2{12} śrudhī havamā huvato huvāno na tvāvānanyo amṛta tvadasti
GV01rv_06_u:473: RV_06.021.11.1{12} nū ma ā vācamupa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajatraiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:474: RV_06.021.11.2{12} ye agnijihvā ṛtasāpa āsurye manuṃ cakruruparaṃ dasāya
GV01rv_06_u:475: RV_06.021.12.1{12} sa no bodhi puraetā sugeṣūta durgeṣu pathikṛd vidānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:476: RV_06.021.12.2{12} ye aśramāsa uravo vahiṣṭhāstebhirna indrābhi vakṣi vājam
GV01rv_06_u:477: RV_06.022.01.1{13} ya eka id dhavyaścarṣaṇīnāmindraṃ taṃ gīrbhirabhyarca ābhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:478: RV_06.022.01.2{13} yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān
GV01rv_06_u:479: RV_06.022.02.1{13} tamu naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi vājayantaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:480: RV_06.022.02.2{13} nakṣaddābhaṃ taturiṃ parvateṣṭhāmadroghavācaṃ matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham
GV01rv_06_u:481: RV_06.022.03.1{13} tamīmaha indramasya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:482: RV_06.022.03.2{13} yo askṛdhoyurajaraḥ svarvān tamā bhara harivo mādayadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:483: RV_06.022.04.1{13} tan no vi voco yadi te purā cijjaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnamindra
GV01rv_06_u:484: RV_06.022.04.2{13} kaste bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso 'suraghnaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:485: RV_06.022.05.1{13} taṃ pṛchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhāmindraṃ vepī vakvarīyasya nū gīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:486: RV_06.022.05.2{13} tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātumiṣe nakṣate tumramacha
GV01rv_06_u:487: RV_06.022.06.1{14} ayā ha tyaṃ māyayā vāvṛdhānaṃ manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena
GV01rv_06_u:488: RV_06.022.06.2{14} acyutā cid vīḷitā svojo rujo vi dṛḷhā dhṛṣatā virapśin
GV01rv_06_u:489: RV_06.022.07.1{14} taṃ vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭhaṃ pratnaṃ pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:490: RV_06.022.07.2{14} sa no vakṣadanimānaḥ suvahmendro viśvānyatidurgahāṇi
GV01rv_06_u:491: RV_06.022.08.1{14} ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā
GV01rv_06_u:492: RV_06.022.08.2{14} tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣāmapaśca
GV01rv_06_u:493: RV_06.022.09.1{14} bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatastveṣasandṛk
GV01rv_06_u:494: RV_06.022.09.2{14} dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:495: RV_06.022.10.1{14} ā saṃyatamindra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīmamṛdhrām
GV01rv_06_u:496: RV_06.022.10.2{14} yayā dāsānyāryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi
GV01rv_06_u:497: RV_06.022.11.1{14} sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhirā gahi prayajyo
GV01rv_06_u:498: RV_06.022.11.2{14} na yā adevo varate na deva ābhiryāhi tūyamā madryadrik
GV01rv_06_u:499: RV_06.023.01.1{15} suta it tvaṃ nimiśla indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamānaukthe
GV01rv_06_u:500: RV_06.023.01.2{15} yad vā yuktābhyāṃ maghavan haribhyāṃ bibhrad vajrambāhvorindra yāsi
GV01rv_06_u:501: RV_06.023.02.1{15} yad vā divi pārye suṣvimindra vṛtrahatye 'vasi śūrasātau
GV01rv_06_u:502: RV_06.023.02.2{15} yad vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣo abibhyadarandhayaḥ śardhata indra dasyūn
GV01rv_06_u:503: RV_06.023.03.1{15} pātā sutamindro astu somaṃ praṇenīrugro jaritāramūtī
GV01rv_06_u:504: RV_06.023.03.2{15} kartā vīrāya suṣvaya u lokaṃ dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit
GV01rv_06_u:505: RV_06.023.04.1{15} ganteyānti savanā haribhyāṃ babhrirvajraṃ papiḥ somaṃ dadirgāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:506: RV_06.023.04.2{15} kartā vīraṃ naryaṃ sarvavīraṃ śrotā havaṃgṛṇata stomavāhāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:507: RV_06.023.05.1{15} asmai vayaṃ yad vāvāna tad viviṣma indrāya yo naḥ pradivo apas kaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:508: RV_06.023.05.2{15} sute some stumasi śaṃsadukthendrāya brahma vardhanaṃ yathāsat
GV01rv_06_u:509: RV_06.023.06.1{16} brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat ta indra matibhirviviṣmaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:510: RV_06.023.06.2{16} sute some sutapāḥ śantamāni rāndryā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:511: RV_06.023.07.1{16} sa no bodhi puroḷāśaṃ rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somaṃ goṛjīkamindra
GV01rv_06_u:512: RV_06.023.07.2{16} edaṃ barhiryajamānasya sīdoruṃ kṛdhi tvāyata u lokam
GV01rv_06_u:513: RV_06.023.08.1{16} sa mandasvā hyanu joṣamugra pra tvā yajñāsa ime aśnuvantu
GV01rv_06_u:514: RV_06.023.08.2{16} preme havāsaḥ puruhūtamasme ā tveyaṃ dhīravasa indra yamyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:515: RV_06.023.09.1{16} taṃ vaḥ sakhāyaḥ saṃ yathā suteṣu somebhirīṃ pṛṇatā bhojamindram
GV01rv_06_u:516: RV_06.023.09.2{16} kuvit tasmā asati no bharāya na suṣvimindro 'vase mṛdhāti
GV01rv_06_u:517: RV_06.023.10.1{16} evedindraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣayadin maghonaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:518: RV_06.023.10.2{16} asad yathā jaritra uta sūririndro rāyo viśvavārasya dātā
GV01rv_06_u:519: RV_06.024.01.1{17} vṛṣā mada indre śloka ukthā sacā someṣu sutapā ṛjīṣī
GV01rv_06_u:520: RV_06.024.01.2{17} arcatryo maghavā nṛbhya ukthairdyukṣo rājā girāmakṣitotiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:521: RV_06.024.02.1{17} taturirvīro naryo vicetāḥ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata urvyūtiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:522: RV_06.024.02.2{17} vasuḥ śaṃso narāṃ kārudhāyā vājī stuto vidathe dāti vājam
GV01rv_06_u:523: RV_06.024.03.1{17} akṣo na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:524: RV_06.024.03.2{17} vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayā vyūtayo ruruhurindra pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:525: RV_06.024.04.1{17} śacīvataste puruśāka śākā gavāmiva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:526: RV_06.024.04.2{17} vatsānāṃ na tantayasta indra dāmanvanto adāmānaḥ sudāman
GV01rv_06_u:527: RV_06.024.05.1{17} anyadadya karvaramanyadu śvo 'sacca san muhurācakririndraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:528: RV_06.024.05.2{17} mitro no atra varuṇaśca pūṣāryo vaśasya paryetāsti
GV01rv_06_u:529: RV_06.024.06.1{18} vi tvadāpo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhādukthebhirindrānayanta yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:530: RV_06.024.06.2{18} taṃ tvābhiḥ suṣṭutibhirvājayanta ājiṃ na jagmurgirvāho aśvāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:531: RV_06.024.07.1{18} na yaṃ jaranti śarado na māsā na dyāva indramavakarśayanti
GV01rv_06_u:532: RV_06.024.07.2{18} vṛddhasya cid vardhatāmasya tanū stomebhirukthaiścaśasyamānā
GV01rv_06_u:533: RV_06.024.08.1{18} na vīḷave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyujūtāya stavān
GV01rv_06_u:534: RV_06.024.08.2{18} ajrā indrasya girayaścid ṛṣvā gambhīre cid bhavatigādhamasmai
GV01rv_06_u:535: RV_06.024.09.1{18} gambhīreṇa na uruṇāmatrin preṣo yandhi sutapāvan vājān
GV01rv_06_u:536: RV_06.024.09.2{18} sthā ū ṣu ūrdhva ūtī ariṣaṇyannaktorvyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām
GV01rv_06_u:537: RV_06.024.10.1{18} sacasva nāyamavase abhīka ito vā tamindra pāhi riṣaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:538: RV_06.024.10.2{18} amā cainamaraṇye pāhi riṣo madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:539: RV_06.025.01.1{19} yā ta ūtiravamā yā paramā yā madhyamendra śuṣminnasti
GV01rv_06_u:540: RV_06.025.01.2{19} tābhirū ṣu vṛtrahatye 'vīrna ebhiśca vājairmahānna ugra
GV01rv_06_u:541: RV_06.025.02.1{19} ābhi spṛdho mithatīrariṣaṇyannamitrasya vyathayā manyumindra
GV01rv_06_u:542: RV_06.025.02.2{19} ābhirviśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīrāryāya viśo 'va tārīrdāsīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:543: RV_06.025.03.1{19} indra jāmaya uta ye 'jāmayo 'rvācīnāso vanuṣo yuyujre
GV01rv_06_u:544: RV_06.025.03.2{19} tvameṣāṃ vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhī parācaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:545: RV_06.025.04.1{19} śūro vā śūraṃ vanate śarīraistanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite
GV01rv_06_u:546: RV_06.025.04.2{19} toke vā goṣu tanaye yadapsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite
GV01rv_06_u:547: RV_06.025.05.1{19} nahi tvā śūro na turo na dhṛṣṇurna tvā yodho manyamāno yuyodha
GV01rv_06_u:548: RV_06.025.05.2{19} indra nakiṣ ṭvā pratyastyeṣāṃ viśvā jātānyabhyasi tāni
GV01rv_06_u:549: RV_06.025.06.1{20} sa patyata ubhayornṛmṇamayoryadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante
GV01rv_06_u:550: RV_06.025.06.2{20} vṛtre vā maho nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite
GV01rv_06_u:551: RV_06.025.07.1{20} adha smā te carṣaṇayo yadejānindra trātota bhavā varūtā
GV01rv_06_u:552: RV_06.025.07.2{20} asmākāso ye nṛtamāso arya indra sūrayo dadhire puronaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:553: RV_06.025.08.1{20} anu te dāyi maha indriyāya satrā te viṣvamanu vṛtrahatye
GV01rv_06_u:554: RV_06.025.08.2{20} anu kṣatramanu saho yajatrendra devebhiranu te nṛṣahye
GV01rv_06_u:555: RV_06.025.09.1{20} evā na spṛdhaḥ samajā samatsvindra rārandhi mithatīradevīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:556: RV_06.025.09.2{20} vidyāma vastoravasā gṛṇanto bharadvājā uta ta indra nūnam
GV01rv_06_u:557: RV_06.026.01.1{21} śrudhī na indra hvayāmasi tvā maho vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:558: RV_06.026.01.2{21} saṃ yad viśo 'yanta śūrasātā ugraṃ no 'vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:559: RV_06.026.02.1{21} tvāṃ vājī havate vājineyo maho vājasya gadhyasya sātau
GV01rv_06_u:560: RV_06.026.02.2{21} tvāṃ vṛtreṣvindra satpatiṃ tarutraṃ tvāṃ caṣṭe muṣṭihā goṣu yudhyan
GV01rv_06_u:561: RV_06.026.03.1{21} tvaṃ kaviṃ codayo 'rkasātau tvaṃ kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ dāśuṣe vark
GV01rv_06_u:562: RV_06.026.03.2{21} tvaṃ śiro amarmaṇaḥ parāhannatithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan
GV01rv_06_u:563: RV_06.026.04.1{21} tvaṃ rathaṃ pra bharo yodham ṛṣvamāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum
GV01rv_06_u:564: RV_06.026.04.2{21} tvaṃ tugraṃ vetasave sacāhan tvaṃ tujiṃ gṛṇantamindra tūtoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:565: RV_06.026.05.1{21} tvaṃ tadukthamindra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yacchatā sahasrāśūra darṣi
GV01rv_06_u:566: RV_06.026.05.2{21} ava girerdāsaṃ śambaraṃ han prāvo divodāsaṃ citrābhirūtī
GV01rv_06_u:568: RV_06.026.06.2{22} tvaṃ rajiṃ piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāśacyā sacāhan
GV01rv_06_u:569: RV_06.026.07.1{22} ahaṃ cana tat sūribhirānaśyāṃ tava jyāya indra sumnamojaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:570: RV_06.026.07.2{22} tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrāstrivarūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha
GV01rv_06_u:571: RV_06.026.08.1{22} vayaṃ te asyāmindra dyumnahūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:572: RV_06.026.08.2{22} prātardaniḥ kṣatraśrīrastu śreṣṭho ghane vṛtrāṇāṃ sanaye dhanānām
GV01rv_06_u:573: RV_06.027.01.1{23} kimasya made kiṃ vasya pītāvindraḥ kimasya sakhye cakāra
GV01rv_06_u:574: RV_06.027.01.2{23} raṇā vā ye niṣadi kiṃ te asya pura vividre kimu nūtanāsaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:575: RV_06.027.02.1{23} sadasya made sad vasya pitavindraḥ sadasya sakhye cakāra
GV01rv_06_u:576: RV_06.027.02.2{23} raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya pura vividre sadu nūtanāsaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:577: RV_06.027.03.1{23} nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavattvasya vidma
GV01rv_06_u:578: RV_06.027.03.2{23} na rādhaso-rādhaso nūtanasyendra nakirdadṛśa indriyaṃ te
GV01rv_06_u:579: RV_06.027.04.1{23} etat tyat ta indriyamaceti yenāvadhīrvaraśikhasya śeṣaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:580: RV_06.027.04.2{23} vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāccidindra paramodadāra
GV01rv_06_u:581: RV_06.027.05.1{23} vadhīdindro varaśikhasya śeṣo 'bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan
GV01rv_06_u:582: RV_06.027.05.2{23} vṛcīvato yad dhariyūpīyāyāṃ han pūrve ardhe bhiyasāparo dart
GV01rv_06_u:583: RV_06.027.06.1{24} triṃśacchataṃ varmiṇa indra sākaṃ yavyāvatyāṃ puruhūta śravasyā
GV01rv_06_u:584: RV_06.027.06.2{24} vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindānanyarthānyāyan
GV01rv_06_u:585: RV_06.027.07.1{24} yasya gāvāvaruṣā sūyavasyū antarū ṣu carato rerihāṇā
GV01rv_06_u:586: RV_06.027.07.2{24} sa sṛñjayāya turvaśaṃ parādād vṛcīvato daivavātāyaśikṣan
GV01rv_06_u:587: RV_06.027.08.1{24} dvayānagne rathino viṃśatiṃ gā vadhūmato maghavā mahyaṃ samrāṭ
GV01rv_06_u:588: RV_06.027.08.2{24} abhyāvartī cāyamāno dadāti dūṇāśeyaṃ dakṣiṇā pārthavānām
GV01rv_06_u:589: RV_06.028.01.1{25} ā gāvo agmannuta bhadramakran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantvasme
GV01rv_06_u:590: RV_06.028.01.2{25} prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syurindrāya pūrvīruṣaso duhānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:591: RV_06.028.02.1{25} indro yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣatyuped dadāti na svaṃ muṣāyati
GV01rv_06_u:592: RV_06.028.02.2{25} bhūyo-bhūyo rayimidasya vardhayannabhinne khilye nidadhāti devayum
GV01rv_06_u:593: RV_06.028.03.1{25} na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsāmāmitro vyathirādadharṣati
GV01rv_06_u:594: RV_06.028.03.2{25} devāṃśca yābhiryajate dadāti ca jyogit tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha
GV01rv_06_u:595: RV_06.028.04.1{25} na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo aśnute na saṃskṛtatramupa yanti tā abhi
GV01rv_06_u:596: RV_06.028.04.2{25} urugāyamabhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vicaranti yajvanaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:597: RV_06.028.05.1{25} gāvo bhago gāva indro me achān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:598: RV_06.028.05.2{25} imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra ichāmīd dhṛdāmanasā cidindram
GV01rv_06_u:599: RV_06.028.06.1{25} yūyaṃ gāvo medayathā kṛśaṃ cidaśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam
GV01rv_06_u:600: RV_06.028.06.2{25} bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu
GV01rv_06_u:601: RV_06.028.07.1{25} prajāvatīḥ sūyavasaṃ riśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇepibantīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:602: RV_06.028.07.2{25} mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:604: RV_06.028.08.2{25} upa ṛṣabhasya retasyupendra tava vīrye
GV01rv_06_u:605: RV_06.029.01.1{01} indraṃ vo naraḥ sakhyāya sepurmaho yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:606: RV_06.029.01.2{01} maho hi dātā vajrahasto asti mahāmu raṇvamavase yajadhvam
GV01rv_06_u:607: RV_06.029.02.1{01} ā yasmin haste naryā mimikṣurā rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:608: RV_06.029.02.2{01} ā raśmayo gabhastyo sthūrayorādhvannaśvāso vṛṣaṇo yujānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:609: RV_06.029.03.1{01} śriye te pādā duva ā mimikṣurdhṛṣṇurvajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān
GV01rv_06_u:610: RV_06.029.03.2{01} vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svarṇa nṛtaviṣiro babhūtha
GV01rv_06_u:611: RV_06.029.04.1{01} sa soma āmiślatamaḥ suto bhūd yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santidhānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:612: RV_06.029.04.2{01} indraṃ nara stuvanto brahmakārā ukthā śaṃsanto devavātatamāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:613: RV_06.029.05.1{01} na te antaḥ śavaso dhāyyasya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā
GV01rv_06_u:614: RV_06.029.05.2{01} ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujāno yūthevāpsu samījamāna ūtī
GV01rv_06_u:615: RV_06.029.06.1{01} evedindraḥ suhava ṛṣvo astūtī anūtī hiriśipraḥ satvā
GV01rv_06_u:616: RV_06.029.06.2{01} evā hi jāto asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn
GV01rv_06_u:617: RV_06.030.01.1{02} bhūya id vāvṛdhe vīryāyaneko ajuryo dayate vasūni
GV01rv_06_u:618: RV_06.030.01.2{02} pra ririce diva indraḥ pṛthivyā ardhamidasya prati rodasī ubhe
GV01rv_06_u:619: RV_06.030.02.1{02} adhā manye bṛhadasuryamasya yāni dādhāra nakirā mināti
GV01rv_06_u:620: RV_06.030.02.2{02} dive-dive sūryo darśato bhūd vi sadmānyurviyā sukraturdhāt
GV01rv_06_u:621: RV_06.030.03.1{02} adyā cin nū cit tadapo nadīnāṃ yadābhyo arado gātumindra
GV01rv_06_u:622: RV_06.030.03.2{02} ni parvatā admasado na sedustvayā dṛḷhāni sukrato rajāṃsi
GV01rv_06_u:623: RV_06.030.04.1{02} satyamit tan na tvāvānanyo astīndra devo na martyo jyāyān
GV01rv_06_u:624: RV_06.030.04.2{02} ahannahiṃ pariśayānamarṇo 'vāsṛjo apo achā samudram
GV01rv_06_u:625: RV_06.030.05.1{02} tvamapo vi duro viṣūcīrindra dṛḷhamarujaḥ parvatasya
GV01rv_06_u:626: RV_06.030.05.2{02} rājābhavo jagataścarṣaṇīnāṃ sākaṃ sūryaṃ janayan dyāmuṣāsam
GV01rv_06_u:627: RV_06.031.01.1{03} abhūreko rayipate rayīṇāmā hastayoradhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:628: RV_06.031.01.2{03} vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre 'vocanta carṣaṇayo vivācaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:629: RV_06.031.02.1{03} tvad bhiyendra pārthivāni viśvācyutā ciccyāvayante rajāṃsi
GV01rv_06_u:630: RV_06.031.02.2{03} dyāvākṣāmā parvatāso vanāni viśvaṃ dṛḷhaṃ bhayate ajmannā te
GV01rv_06_u:631: RV_06.031.03.1{03} tvaṃ kutsenābhi śuṣṇamindrāśuṣaṃ yudhya kuyavaṃ gaviṣṭau
GV01rv_06_u:632: RV_06.031.03.2{03} daśa prapitve adha sūryasya muṣāyaścakramaviverapāṃsi
GV01rv_06_u:633: RV_06.031.04.1{03} tvaṃ śatānyava śambarasya puro jaghanthāpratīni sasyoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:634: RV_06.031.04.2{03} aśikṣo yatra śacyā śacīvo divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni
GV01rv_06_u:635: RV_06.031.05.1{03} sa satyasatvan mahate raṇāya rathamā tiṣṭha tuvinṛmṇa bhīmam
GV01rv_06_u:636: RV_06.031.05.2{03} yāhi prapathinnavasopa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:637: RV_06.032.01.1{04} apūrvyā purutamānyasmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya
GV01rv_06_u:638: RV_06.032.01.2{04} virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsyāsā sthavirāya takṣam
GV01rv_06_u:639: RV_06.032.02.1{04} sa mātarā sūryeṇā kavīnāmavāsayad rujadadriṃ gṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:641: RV_06.032.03.1{04} sa vahnibhirṛkvabhirgoṣu śaśvan mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya
GV01rv_06_u:642: RV_06.032.03.2{04} puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san
GV01rv_06_u:643: RV_06.032.04.1{04} sa nīvyābhirjaritāramachā maho vājebhirmahadbhiśca śuṣmaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:644: RV_06.032.04.2{04} puruvīrābhirvṛṣabha kṣitīnāmā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi
GV01rv_06_u:645: RV_06.032.05.1{04} sa sargeṇa śavasā takto atyairapa indro dakṣiṇatasturāṣāṭ
GV01rv_06_u:646: RV_06.032.05.2{04} itthā sṛjānā anapāvṛdarthaṃ dive-dive viviṣurapramṛṣyam
GV01rv_06_u:647: RV_06.033.01.1{05} ya ojiṣṭha indra taṃ su no dā mado vṛṣan svabhiṣṭirdāsvān
GV01rv_06_u:648: RV_06.033.01.2{05} sauvaśvyaṃ yo vanavat svaśvo vṛtrā samatsu sāsahadamitrān
GV01rv_06_u:649: RV_06.033.02.1{05} tvāṃ hīndrāvase vivāco havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau
GV01rv_06_u:650: RV_06.033.02.2{05} tvaṃ viprebhirvi paṇīnraśāyastvota it sanitā vājamarvā
GV01rv_06_u:651: RV_06.033.03.1{05} tvaṃ tānindrobhayānamitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇyāryā ca śūra
GV01rv_06_u:652: RV_06.033.03.2{05} vadhīrvaneva sudhitebhiratkairā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇāṃ nṛtama
GV01rv_06_u:653: RV_06.033.04.1{05} sa tvaṃ na indrākavābhirūtī sakhā viśvāyuravitā vṛdhe bhūḥ
GV01rv_06_u:654: RV_06.033.04.2{05} svarṣātā yad dhvayāmasi tvā yudhyanto nemadhitāpṛtsu śūra
GV01rv_06_u:655: RV_06.033.05.1{05} nūnaṃ na indrāparāya ca syā bhavā mṛḷīka uta no abhiṣṭau
GV01rv_06_u:656: RV_06.033.05.2{05} itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śarman divi ṣyāma pārye goṣatamāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:657: RV_06.034.01.1{06} saṃ ca tve jagmurgira indra pūrvīrvi ca tvad yanti vibhvomanīṣāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:658: RV_06.034.01.2{06} pūrā nūnaṃ ca stutaya ṛṣīṇāṃ paspṛdhra indre adhyukthārkā
GV01rv_06_u:659: RV_06.034.02.1{06} puruhūto yaḥ purugūrta ṛbhvānekaḥ purupraśasto asti yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:660: RV_06.034.02.2{06} ratho na mahe śavase yujāno 'smābhirindro anumādyo bhūt
GV01rv_06_u:661: RV_06.034.03.1{06} na yaṃ hiṃsanti dhītayo na vāṇīrindraṃ nakṣantīdabhi vardhayantīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:662: RV_06.034.03.2{06} yadi stotāraḥ śataṃ yat sahasraṃ gṛṇanti girvaṇasaṃ śaṃ tadasmai
GV01rv_06_u:663: RV_06.034.04.1{06} asmā etad divyarceva māsā mimikṣa indre nyayāmi somaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:664: RV_06.034.04.2{06} janaṃ na dhanvannabhi saṃ yadāpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhurhavanāni yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:665: RV_06.034.05.1{06} asmā etan mahyāṅgūṣamasmā indrāya stotraṃ matibhiravāci
GV01rv_06_u:666: RV_06.034.05.2{06} asad yathā mahati vṛtratūrya indro viśvāyuravitā vṛdhaśca
GV01rv_06_u:667: RV_06.035.01.1{07} kadā bhuvan rathakṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasrapoṣyandāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:668: RV_06.035.01.2{07} kadā stomaṃ vāsayo 'sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vājaratnāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:669: RV_06.035.02.1{07} karhi svit tadindra yan nṛbhirnṝn vīrairvīrān nīḷayāse jayājīn
GV01rv_06_u:670: RV_06.035.02.2{07} tridhātu gā adhi jayāsi goṣvindra dyumnaṃsvarvad dhehyasme
GV01rv_06_u:671: RV_06.035.03.1{07} karhi svit tadindra yajjaritre viṣvapsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha
GV01rv_06_u:672: RV_06.035.03.2{07} kadā dhiyo na niyuto yuvāse kadā gomaghā havanāni gachāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:673: RV_06.035.04.1{07} sa gomaghā jaritre aśvaścandrā vājaśravaso adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:674: RV_06.035.04.2{07} pīpihīṣaḥ sudughāmindra dhenuṃ bharadvājeṣu suruco rurucyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:675: RV_06.035.05.1{07} tamā nūnaṃ vṛjanamanyathā cicchūro yacchakra vi durogṛṇīṣe
GV01rv_06_u:676: RV_06.035.05.2{07} mā niraraṃ śukradughasya dhenorāṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva
GV01rv_06_u:677: RV_06.036.01.1{08} satrā madāsastava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyo 'dha ye pārthivāsaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:678: RV_06.036.01.2{08} satrā vājānāmabhavo vibhaktā yad deveṣu dhārayathā asuryam
GV01rv_06_u:679: RV_06.036.02.1{08} anu pra yeje jana ojo asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya
GV01rv_06_u:680: RV_06.036.02.2{08} syūmagṛbhe dudhaye 'rvate ca kratuṃ vṛñjantyapi vṛtrahatye
GV01rv_06_u:681: RV_06.036.03.1{08} taṃ sadhrīcīrūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścurindram
GV01rv_06_u:682: RV_06.036.03.2{08} samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ giraā viśanti
GV01rv_06_u:683: RV_06.036.04.1{08} sa rāyas khāmupa sṛjā gṛṇānaḥ puruścandrasya tvamindravasvaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:684: RV_06.036.04.2{08} patirbabhūthāsamo janānāmeko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā
GV01rv_06_u:685: RV_06.036.05.1{08} sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yo duvoyurdyaurna bhūmābhi rāyoaryaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:686: RV_06.036.05.2{08} aso yathā naḥ śavasā cakāno yuge-yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:687: RV_06.037.01.1{09} arvāg rathaṃ viśvavāraṃ ta ugrendra yuktāso harayo vahantu
GV01rv_06_u:688: RV_06.037.01.2{09} kīriścid dhi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādasteadya
GV01rv_06_u:689: RV_06.037.02.1{09} pro droṇe harayaḥ karmāgman punānāsa ṛjyanto abhūvan
GV01rv_06_u:690: RV_06.037.02.2{09} indro no asya pūrvyaḥ papīyād dyukṣo madasya somyasya rājā
GV01rv_06_u:691: RV_06.037.03.1{09} āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānamachendraṃ sucakre rathyāso aśvāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:692: RV_06.037.03.2{09} abhi śrava ṛjyanto vaheyurnū cin nu vāyoramṛtaṃ vidasyet
GV01rv_06_u:693: RV_06.037.04.1{09} variṣṭho asya dakṣiṇāmiyartīndro maghonāṃ tuvikūrmitamaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:694: RV_06.037.04.2{09} yayā vajrivaḥ pariyāsyaṃho maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn
GV01rv_06_u:695: RV_06.037.05.1{09} indro vājasya sthavirasya dātendro gīrbhirvardhatāṃ vṛddhamahāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:696: RV_06.037.05.2{09} indro vṛtraṃ haniṣṭho astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:697: RV_06.038.01.1{10} apādita udu naścitratamo mahīṃ bharṣad dyumatīmindrahūtim
GV01rv_06_u:698: RV_06.038.01.2{10} panyasīṃ dhītiṃ daivyasya yāmañ janasya rātiṃ vanate sudānuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:699: RV_06.038.02.1{10} dūrāccidā vasato asya karṇā ghoṣādindrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:701: RV_06.038.03.1{10} taṃ vo dhiyā paramayā purājāmajaramindramabhyanūṣyarkaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:702: RV_06.038.03.2{10} brahmā ca giro dadhire samasmin mahāṃśca stomo adhi vardhadindre
GV01rv_06_u:703: RV_06.038.04.1{10} vardhād yaṃ yajña uta soma indraṃ vardhād brahma gira ukthā ca manma
GV01rv_06_u:704: RV_06.038.04.2{10} vardhāhainamuṣaso yāmannaktorvardhān māsāḥ śarado dyāva indram
GV01rv_06_u:705: RV_06.038.05.1{10} evā jajñānaṃ sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānaṃ rādhase ca śrutāya
GV01rv_06_u:706: RV_06.038.05.2{10} mahāmugramavase vipra nūnamā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu
GV01rv_06_u:707: RV_06.039.01.1{11} mandrasya kaverdivyasya vahnervipramanmano vacanasya madhvaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:708: RV_06.039.01.2{11} apā nastasya sacanasya deveṣo yuvasva gṛṇate goagrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:710: RV_06.039.02.2{11} rujadarugṇaṃ vi valasya sānuṃ paṇīnrvacobhirabhi yodhadindraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:711: RV_06.039.03.1{11} ayaṃ dyotayadadyuto vyaktūn doṣā vastoḥ śarada indurindra
GV01rv_06_u:712: RV_06.039.03.2{11} imaṃ ketumadadhurnū cidahnāṃ śucijanmana uṣasaścakāra
GV01rv_06_u:713: RV_06.039.04.1{11} ayaṃ rocayadaruco rucāno 'yaṃ vāsayad vy ṛtena pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:714: RV_06.039.04.2{11} ayamīyata ṛtayugbhiraśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇiprāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:715: RV_06.039.05.1{11} nū gṛṇāno gṛṇate pratna rājanniṣaḥ pinva vasudeyāya pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:716: RV_06.039.05.2{11} apa oṣadhīraviṣā vanāni gā arvato nṝn ṛcase rirīhi
GV01rv_06_u:717: RV_06.040.01.1{12} indra piba tubhyaṃ suto madāyāva sya harī vi mucā sakhāyā
GV01rv_06_u:718: RV_06.040.01.2{12} uta pra gāya gaṇa ā niṣadyāthā yajñāya gṛṇate vayo dhāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:719: RV_06.040.02.1{12} asya piba yasya jajñāna indra madāya kratve apibo virapśin
GV01rv_06_u:720: RV_06.040.02.2{12} tamu te gāvo nara āpo adririnduṃ samahyan pītaye samasmai
GV01rv_06_u:721: RV_06.040.03.1{12} samiddhe agnau suta indra soma ā tvā vahantu harayo vahiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:722: RV_06.040.03.2{12} tvāyatā manasā johavīmīndrā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ
GV01rv_06_u:723: RV_06.040.04.1{12} ā yāhi śaśvaduśatā yayāthendra mahā manasā somapeyam
GV01rv_06_u:724: RV_06.040.04.2{12} upa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā no 'thā te yajñastanve vayo dhāt
GV01rv_06_u:725: RV_06.040.05.1{12} yadindra divi pārye yad ṛdhag yad vā sve sadane yatra vāsi
GV01rv_06_u:726: RV_06.040.05.2{12} ato no yajñamavase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:727: RV_06.041.01.1{13} aheḷamāna upa yāhi yajñaṃ tubhyaṃ pavanta indavaḥ sutāsaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:728: RV_06.041.01.2{13} gāvo na vajrin svamoko achendrā gahi prathamo yajñiyānām
GV01rv_06_u:729: RV_06.041.02.1{13} yā te kākut sukṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhva ūrmim
GV01rv_06_u:730: RV_06.041.02.2{13} tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryurasthāt saṃ te vajrovartatāmindra gavyuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:731: RV_06.041.03.1{13} eṣa drapso vṛṣabho viśvarūpa indrāya vṛṣṇe samakāri somaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:732: RV_06.041.03.2{13} etaṃ piba hariva sthātarugra yasyeśiṣe pradivi yasteannam
GV01rv_06_u:733: RV_06.041.04.1{13} sutaḥ somo asutādindra vasyānayaṃ śreyāñcikituṣe raṇāya
GV01rv_06_u:734: RV_06.041.04.2{13} etaṃ titirva upa yāhi yajñaṃ tena viśvāstaviṣīrā pṛṇasva
GV01rv_06_u:735: RV_06.041.05.1{13} hvayāmasi tvendra yāhyarvāṃ araṃ te somastanve bhavāti
GV01rv_06_u:736: RV_06.041.05.2{13} śatakrato mādayasvā suteṣu prāsmānava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu
GV01rv_06_u:737: RV_06.042.01.1{14} pratyasmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara
GV01rv_06_u:742: RV_06.042.03.2{14} vedā viśvasya medhiro dhṛṣat taṃ-tamideṣate
GV01rv_06_u:743: RV_06.042.04.1{14} asmā-asmā idandhaso 'dhvaryo pra bharā sutam
GV01rv_06_u:745: RV_06.043.01.1{15} yasya tyacchambaraṃ made divodāsāya randhayaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:746: RV_06.043.01.2{15} ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba
GV01rv_06_u:747: RV_06.043.02.1{15} yasya tīvrasutaṃ madaṃ madhyamantaṃ ca rakṣase
GV01rv_06_u:749: RV_06.043.03.1{15} yasya gā antaraśmano made dṛḷhā avāsṛjaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:751: RV_06.043.04.1{15} yasya mandāno andhaso māghonaṃ dadhiṣe śavaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:753: RV_06.044.01.1{16} yo rayivo rayintamo yo dyumnairdyumnavattamaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:754: RV_06.044.01.2{16} somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:755: RV_06.044.02.1{16} yaḥ śagmastuviśagma te rāyo dāmā matīnām
GV01rv_06_u:757: RV_06.044.03.1{16} yena vṛddho na śavasā turo na svābhirūtibhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:759: RV_06.044.04.1{16} tyamu vo aprahaṇaṃ gṛṇīṣe śavasas patim
GV01rv_06_u:760: RV_06.044.04.2{16} indraṃ viśvāsāhaṃ naraṃ maṃhiṣṭhaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim
GV01rv_06_u:761: RV_06.044.05.1{16} yaṃ vardhayantīd giraḥ patiṃ turasya rādhasaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:762: RV_06.044.05.2{16} taminnvasya rodasī devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:764: RV_06.044.06.2{17} vipo na yasyotayo vi yad rohanti sakṣitaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:765: RV_06.044.07.1{17} avidad dakṣaṃ mitro navīyān papāno devebhyo vasyo acait
GV01rv_06_u:767: RV_06.044.08.1{17} ṛtasya pathi vedhā apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāso akran
GV01rv_06_u:768: RV_06.044.08.2{17} dadhāno nāma maho vacobhirvapurdṛśaye venyo vyāvaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:769: RV_06.044.09.1{17} dyumattamaṃ dakṣaṃ dhehyasme sedhā janānāṃ pūrvīrarātīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:770: RV_06.044.09.2{17} varṣīyo vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhirdhanasya sātāvasmānaviḍḍhi
GV01rv_06_u:771: RV_06.044.10.1{17} indra tubhyamin maghavannabhūma vayaṃ dātre harivo mā vivenaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:773: RV_06.044.11.1{18} mā jasvane vṛṣabha no rarīthā mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma
GV01rv_06_u:774: RV_06.044.11.2{18} pūrvīṣ ṭa indra niṣṣidho janeṣu jahyasuṣvīn pra vṛhāpṛṇataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:776: RV_06.044.12.2{18} tvamasi pradivaḥ kārudhāyā mā tvādāmāna ā dabhanmaghonaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:777: RV_06.044.13.1{18} adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānāmindrāya bhara sa hyasya rājā
GV01rv_06_u:778: RV_06.044.13.2{18} yaḥ pūrvyābhiruta nūtanābhirgīrbhirvāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām
GV01rv_06_u:779: RV_06.044.14.1{18} asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvānindro vṛtrāṇyapratī jaghāna
GV01rv_06_u:780: RV_06.044.14.2{18} tamu pra hoṣi madhumantamasmai somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:781: RV_06.044.15.1{18} pātā sutamindro astu somaṃ hantā vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:782: RV_06.044.15.2{18} gantā yajñaṃ parāvataścidachā vasurdhīnāmavitā kārudhāyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:784: RV_06.044.16.2{19} matsad yathā saumanasāya devaṃ vyasmad dveṣo yuyavad vyaṃhaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:785: RV_06.044.17.1{19} enā mandāno jahi śūra śatrūñ jāmimajāmiṃ maghavannamitrān
GV01rv_06_u:786: RV_06.044.17.2{19} abhiṣeṇānabhyādediśānān parāca indra pra mṛṇājahī ca
GV01rv_06_u:787: RV_06.044.18.1{19} āsu ṣmā ṇo maghavannindra pṛtsvasmabhyaṃ mahi varivaḥ sugaṃ kaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:788: RV_06.044.18.2{19} apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣa indra sūrīn kṛṇuhismā no ardham
GV01rv_06_u:789: RV_06.044.19.1{19} ā tvā harayo vṛṣaṇo yujānā vṛṣarathāso vṛṣaraśmayo 'tyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:790: RV_06.044.19.2{19} asmatrāñco vṛṣaṇo vajravāho vṛṣṇe madāya suyujovahantu
GV01rv_06_u:791: RV_06.044.20.1{19} ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇo droṇamasthurghṛtapruṣo normayo madantaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:792: RV_06.044.20.2{19} indra pra tubhyaṃ vṛṣabhiḥ sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe bharantivṛṣabhāya somam
GV01rv_06_u:793: RV_06.044.21.1{20} vṛṣāsi divo vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyā vṛṣā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabhastiyānām
GV01rv_06_u:794: RV_06.044.21.2{20} vṛṣṇe ta indurvṛṣabha pīpāya svādū raso madhupeyo varāya
GV01rv_06_u:795: RV_06.044.22.1{20} ayaṃ devaḥ sahasā jāyamāna indreṇa yujā paṇimastabhāyat
GV01rv_06_u:798: RV_06.044.23.2{20} ayaṃ tridhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindadamṛtaṃ nigūḷham
GV01rv_06_u:799: RV_06.044.24.1{20} ayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī vi ṣkabhāyadayaṃ rathamayunak saptaraśmim
GV01rv_06_u:800: RV_06.044.24.2{20} ayaṃ goṣu śacyā pakvamantaḥ somo dādhāra daśayantramutsam
GV01rv_06_u:801: RV_06.045.01.1{21} ya ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśaṃ yadum
GV01rv_06_u:803: RV_06.045.02.1{21} avipre cid vayo dadhadanāśunā cidarvatā
GV01rv_06_u:807: RV_06.045.04.1{21} sakhāyo brahmavāhase 'rcata pra ca gāyata
GV01rv_06_u:813: RV_06.045.07.1{22} brahmāṇaṃ brahmavāhasaṃ gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam
GV01rv_06_u:815: RV_06.045.08.1{22} yasya viśvāni hastayorūcurvasūni ni dvitā
GV01rv_06_u:817: RV_06.045.09.1{22} vi dṛḷhāni cidadrivo janānāṃ śacīpate
GV01rv_06_u:819: RV_06.045.10.1{22} tamu tvā satya somapā indra vājānāṃ pate
GV01rv_06_u:821: RV_06.045.11.1{23} tamu tvā yaḥ purāsitha yo vā nūnaṃ hite dhane
GV01rv_06_u:825: RV_06.045.13.1{23} abhūru vīra girvaṇo mahānindra dhane hite
GV01rv_06_u:831: RV_06.045.16.1{24} ya eka it tamu ṣṭuhi kṛṣṭīnāṃ vicarṣaṇiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:835: RV_06.045.18.1{24} dhiṣva vajraṃ gabhastyo rakṣohatyāya vajrivaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:837: RV_06.045.19.1{24} pratnaṃ rayīṇāṃ yujaṃ sakhāyaṃ kīricodanam
GV01rv_06_u:839: RV_06.045.20.1{24} sa hi viśvāni pārthivāneko vasūni patyate
GV01rv_06_u:841: RV_06.045.21.1{25} sa no niyudbhirā pṛṇa kāmaṃ vājebhiraśvibhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:843: RV_06.045.22.1{25} tad vo gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane
GV01rv_06_u:846: RV_06.045.23.1{25} na ghā vasurni yamate dānaṃ vājasya gomataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:848: RV_06.045.24.1{25} kuvitsasya pra hi vrajaṃ gomantaṃ dasyuhā gamat
GV01rv_06_u:850: RV_06.045.25.1{25} imā u tvā śatakrato 'bhi pra ṇonuvurgiraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:852: RV_06.045.26.1{26} dūṇāśaṃ sakhyaṃ tava gaurasi vīra gavyate
GV01rv_06_u:855: RV_06.045.28.1{26} imā u tvā sute-sute nakṣante girvaṇo giraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:859: RV_06.045.30.1{26} asmākamindra bhūtu te stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:861: RV_06.045.31.1{26} adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnāṃ varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhannasthāt
GV01rv_06_u:863: RV_06.045.32.1{26} yasya vāyoriva dravad bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī
GV01rv_06_u:865: RV_06.045.33.1{26} tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:867: RV_06.046.01.1{27} tvāmid dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:868: RV_06.046.01.2{27} tvāṃ vṛtreṣvindra satpatiṃ narastvāṃ kāṣṭhāsvarvataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:869: RV_06.046.02.1{27} sa tvaṃ naścitra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:870: RV_06.046.02.2{27} gāmaśvaṃ rathyamindra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe
GV01rv_06_u:871: RV_06.046.03.1{27} yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇirindraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam
GV01rv_06_u:872: RV_06.046.03.2{27} sahasramuṣka tuvinṛmṇa satpate bhavā samatsu no vṛdhe
GV01rv_06_u:873: RV_06.046.04.1{27} bādhase janān vṛṣabheva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḷha ṛcīṣama
GV01rv_06_u:874: RV_06.046.04.2{27} asmākaṃ bodhyavitā mahādhane tanūṣvapsu sūrye
GV01rv_06_u:875: RV_06.046.05.1{27} indra jyeṣṭhaṃ na ā bharanojiṣṭhaṃ papuri śravaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:876: RV_06.046.05.2{27} yeneme citra vajrahasta rodasī obhe suśipra prāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:877: RV_06.046.06.1{28} tvāmugramavase carṣaṇīsahaṃ rājan deveṣu hūmahe
GV01rv_06_u:878: RV_06.046.06.2{28} viśvā su no vithurā pibdanā vaso 'mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi
GV01rv_06_u:879: RV_06.046.07.1{28} yadindra nāhuṣīṣvānojo nṛmṇaṃ ca kṛṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_06_u:880: RV_06.046.07.2{28} yad vāpañca kṣitīnāṃ dyumnamā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā
GV01rv_06_u:881: RV_06.046.08.1{28} yad vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyāvā jane yat pūrau kacca vṛṣṇyam
GV01rv_06_u:882: RV_06.046.08.2{28} asmabhyaṃ tad rirīhi saṃ nṛṣāhye 'mitrān pṛtsuturvaṇe
GV01rv_06_u:883: RV_06.046.09.1{28} indra tridhātu śaraṇaṃ trivarūthaṃ svastimat
GV01rv_06_u:884: RV_06.046.09.2{28} chardiryacha maghavadbhyaśca mahyaṃ ca yāvayā didyumebhyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:885: RV_06.046.10.1{28} ye gavyatā manasā śatrumādabhurabhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā
GV01rv_06_u:886: RV_06.046.10.2{28} adha smā no maghavannindra girvaṇastanūpā antamo bhava
GV01rv_06_u:887: RV_06.046.11.1{29} adha smā no vṛdhe bhavendra nāyamavā yudhi
GV01rv_06_u:889: RV_06.046.12.1{29} yatra śūrāsastanvo vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām
GV01rv_06_u:890: RV_06.046.12.2{29} adha smā yacha tanve tane ca chardiracittaṃ yāvaya dveṣaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:892: RV_06.046.13.2{29} asamane adhvanivṛjine pathi śyenāniva śravasyatah
GV01rv_06_u:893: RV_06.046.14.1{29} sindhūnriva pravaṇa āśuyā yato yadi klośamanu ṣvaṇi
GV01rv_06_u:894: RV_06.046.14.2{29} ā ye vayo na varvṛtatyāmiṣi gṛbhītā bāhvorgavi
GV01rv_06_u:895: RV_06.047.01.1{30} svāduṣ kilāyaṃ madhumānutāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavānutāyam
GV01rv_06_u:896: RV_06.047.01.2{30} uto nvasya papivāṃsamindraṃ na kaścanasahata āhaveṣu
GV01rv_06_u:897: RV_06.047.02.1{30} ayaṃ svāduriha madiṣṭha āsa yasyendro vṛtrahatye mamāda
GV01rv_06_u:898: RV_06.047.02.2{30} purūṇi yaścyautnā śambarasya vi navatiṃ nava ca dehyo han
GV01rv_06_u:899: RV_06.047.03.1{30} ayaṃ me pīta udiyarti vacamayaṃ manīṣāmuśatīmajīgaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:900: RV_06.047.03.2{30} ayaṃ ṣaḷ urvīramimīta dhīro na yābhyo bhuvanaṃ kaccanāre
GV01rv_06_u:901: RV_06.047.04.1{30} ayaṃ sa yo varimāṇaṃ pṛthivyā varṣmāṇaṃ divo akṛṇodayaṃ saḥ
GV01rv_06_u:902: RV_06.047.04.2{30} ayaṃ pīyūṣaṃ tisṛṣu pravatsu somo dādhārorvantarikṣam
GV01rv_06_u:904: RV_06.047.05.2{30} ayaṃ mahān mahatā skambhanenod dyāmastabhnād vṛṣabhomarutvān
GV01rv_06_u:905: RV_06.047.06.1{31} dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somamindra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām
GV01rv_06_u:906: RV_06.047.06.2{31} mādhyandine savana ā vṛṣasva rayisthāno rayimasmāsu dhehi
GV01rv_06_u:907: RV_06.047.07.1{31} indra pra ṇaḥ puraeteva paśya pra no naya prataraṃ vasyo acha
GV01rv_06_u:908: RV_06.047.07.2{31} bhavā supāro atipārayo no bhavā sunītiruta vāmanītiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:909: RV_06.047.08.1{31} uruṃ no lokamanu neṣi vidvān svarvajjyotirabhayaṃ svasti
GV01rv_06_u:910: RV_06.047.08.2{31} ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā
GV01rv_06_u:911: RV_06.047.09.1{31} variṣṭhe na indra vandhure dhā vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvannaśvayorā
GV01rv_06_u:912: RV_06.047.09.2{31} iṣamā vakṣīṣāṃ varṣiṣṭhāṃ mā nastārīn maghavan rāyo aryaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:913: RV_06.047.10.1{31} indra mṛḷa mahyaṃ jīvātumicha codaya dhiyamayaso na dhārām
GV01rv_06_u:914: RV_06.047.10.2{31} yat kiṃ cāhaṃ tvāyuridaṃ vadāmi tajjuṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam
GV01rv_06_u:916: RV_06.047.11.2{32} hvayāmi śakraṃ puruhūtamindraṃ svasti no maghavādhātvindraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:917: RV_06.047.12.1{32} indraḥ sutrāmā svavānavobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:918: RV_06.047.12.2{32} bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma
GV01rv_06_u:919: RV_06.047.13.1{32} tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma
GV01rv_06_u:920: RV_06.047.13.2{32} sa sutrāmā svavānindro asme ārāccid dveṣaḥ sanutaryuyotu
GV01rv_06_u:921: RV_06.047.14.1{32} ava tve indra pravato normirgiro brahmāṇi niyuto dhavante
GV01rv_06_u:922: RV_06.047.14.2{32} urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇyapo gā vajrin yuvase samindūn
GV01rv_06_u:923: RV_06.047.15.1{32} ka īṃ stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt ko yajāte yadugramin maghavā viśvahāvet
GV01rv_06_u:924: RV_06.047.15.2{32} pādāviva praharannanyam-anyaṃ kṛṇoti pūrvamaparaṃ śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:925: RV_06.047.16.1{33} śṛṇve vīra ugram-ugraṃ damāyannanyam anyamatinenīyamānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:926: RV_06.047.16.2{33} edhamānadviḷ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśa indro manuṣyān
GV01rv_06_u:927: RV_06.047.17.1{33} parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhireti
GV01rv_06_u:929: RV_06.047.18.1{33} rūpaṃ-rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva tadasya rūpaṃ praticakṣaṇāya
GV01rv_06_u:930: RV_06.047.18.2{33} indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hyasya harayaḥśatā daśa
GV01rv_06_u:931: RV_06.047.19.1{33} yujāno haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭeha rājati
GV01rv_06_u:932: RV_06.047.19.2{33} ko viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣa āsata utāsīneṣu sūriṣu
GV01rv_06_u:933: RV_06.047.20.1{33} agavyūti kṣetramāgamna devā urvī satī bhūmiraṃhūraṇābhūt
GV01rv_06_u:934: RV_06.047.20.2{33} bṛhaspate pra cikitsā gaviṣṭāvitthā sate jaritraindra panthām
GV01rv_06_u:935: RV_06.047.21.1{34} dive-dive sadṛśīranyamardhaṃ kṛṣṇā asedhatapa sadmanojāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:936: RV_06.047.21.2{34} ahan dāsā vṛṣabho vasnayantodavraje varcinaṃ śambaraṃ ca
GV01rv_06_u:937: RV_06.047.22.1{34} prastoka in nu rādhasasta indra daśa kośayīrdaśa vājino 'dāt
GV01rv_06_u:938: RV_06.047.22.2{34} divodāsādatithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaraṃ vasu pratyagrabhīṣma
GV01rv_06_u:939: RV_06.047.23.1{34} daśāśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrādhibhojanā
GV01rv_06_u:941: RV_06.047.24.1{34} daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śataṃ gā atharvabhyaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:943: RV_06.047.25.1{34} mahi rādho viśvajanyaṃ dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayo abhyayaṣṭa
GV01rv_06_u:944: RV_06.047.26.1{35} vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:945: RV_06.047.26.2{35} gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḷayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni
GV01rv_06_u:946: RV_06.047.27.1{35} divas pṛthivyāḥ paryoja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ paryābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:947: RV_06.047.27.2{35} apāmojmānaṃ pari gobhirāvṛtamindrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja
GV01rv_06_u:948: RV_06.047.28.1{35} indrasya vajro marutāmanīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:949: RV_06.047.28.2{35} semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya
GV01rv_06_u:950: RV_06.047.29.1{35} upa śvāsaya pṛthivīmuta dyāṃ purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
GV01rv_06_u:951: RV_06.047.29.2{35} sa dundubhe sajūrindreṇa devairdūrād davīyoapa sedha śatrūn
GV01rv_06_u:952: RV_06.047.30.1{35} ā krandaya balamojo na ā dhā ni ṣṭanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:953: RV_06.047.30.2{35} apa protha dundubhe duchunā ita indrasya muṣṭirasi vīḷayasva
GV01rv_06_u:955: RV_06.047.31.2{35} samaśvaparṇāścaranti no naro 'smākamindra rathino jayantu
GV01rv_06_u:956: RV_06.048.01.1{01} yajñā-yajñā vo agnaye girā-girā ca dakṣase
GV01rv_06_u:957: RV_06.048.01.2{01} pra-pra vayamamṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam
GV01rv_06_u:958: RV_06.048.02.1{01} ūrjo napātaṃ sa hināyamasmayurdāśema havyadātaye
GV01rv_06_u:959: RV_06.048.02.2{01} bhuvad vājeṣvavitā bhuvad vṛdha uta trātā tanūnām
GV01rv_06_u:960: RV_06.048.03.1{01} vṛṣā hyagne ajaro mahān vibhāsyarciṣā
GV01rv_06_u:961: RV_06.048.03.2{01} ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucacchuce sudītibhiḥ su dīdihi
GV01rv_06_u:962: RV_06.048.04.1{01} maho devān yajasi yakṣyānuṣak tava kratvota daṃsanā
GV01rv_06_u:963: RV_06.048.04.2{01} arvācaḥ sīṃ kṛṇuhyagne 'vase rāsva vājota vaṃsva
GV01rv_06_u:964: RV_06.048.05.1{01} yamāpo adrayo vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati
GV01rv_06_u:965: RV_06.048.05.2{01} sahasā yo mathito jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyā adhi sānavi
GV01rv_06_u:966: RV_06.048.06.1{02} ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi
GV01rv_06_u:967: RV_06.048.06.2{02} tirastamo dadṛśa ūrmyāsvā śyāvāsvaruṣo vṛṣā śyāvā aruṣo vṛṣā
GV01rv_06_u:968: RV_06.048.07.1{02} bṛhadbhiragne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā
GV01rv_06_u:969: RV_06.048.07.2{02} bharadvāje samidhāno yaviṣṭhya revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi
GV01rv_06_u:971: RV_06.048.08.2{02} śataṃ pūrbhiryaviṣṭha pāhyaṃhasaḥ sameddhāraṃ śataṃ himā stotṛbhyo ye ca dadati
GV01rv_06_u:972: RV_06.048.09.1{02} tvaṃ naścitra ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya
GV01rv_06_u:973: RV_06.048.09.2{02} asya rāyastvamagne rathīrasi vidā gādhaṃ tuce tu naḥ
GV01rv_06_u:974: RV_06.048.10.1{02} parṣi tokaṃ tanayaṃ partṛbhiṣ ṭvamadabdhairaprayutvabhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:975: RV_06.048.10.2{02} agne heḷāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi no 'devāni hvarāṃsi ca
GV01rv_06_u:976: RV_06.048.11.1{03} ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughāṃ dhenumajadhvamupa navyasā vacaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:978: RV_06.048.12.1{03} yā śardhāya mārutāya svabhānave śravo 'mṛtyu dhukṣata
GV01rv_06_u:979: RV_06.048.12.2{03} yā mṛḷīke marutāṃ turāṇāṃ yā sumnairevayāvarī
GV01rv_06_u:981: RV_06.048.13.2{03} dhenuṃ ca viśvadohasamiṣaṃ ca viśvabhojasam
GV01rv_06_u:982: RV_06.048.14.1{03} taṃ va indraṃ na sukratuṃ varuṇamiva māyinam
GV01rv_06_u:983: RV_06.048.14.2{03} aryamaṇaṃ na mandraṃ sṛprabhojasaṃ viṣṇuṃ na stuṣa ādiśe
GV01rv_06_u:984: RV_06.048.15.1{03} tveṣaṃ śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇyanarvāṇaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ saṃ yathā śatā
GV01rv_06_u:985: RV_06.048.15.2{03} saṃ sahasrā kāriṣaccarṣaṇibhya ānāvirgūḷhā vasū karat suvedā no vasū karat
GV01rv_06_u:986: RV_06.048.16.1{03} ā mā pūṣannupa drava śaṃsiṣaṃ nu te apikarṇa āghṛṇe
GV01rv_06_u:988: RV_06.048.17.1{04} mā kākambīramud vṛho vanaspatimaśastīrvi hi nīnaśaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:989: RV_06.048.17.2{04} mota sūro aha evā cana grīvā ādadhate veḥ
GV01rv_06_u:992: RV_06.048.19.1{04} paro hi martyairasi samo devairuta śriyā
GV01rv_06_u:993: RV_06.048.19.2{04} abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu nastvamavā nūnaṃ yathā purā
GV01rv_06_u:994: RV_06.048.20.1{04} vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītirastu sūnṛtā
GV01rv_06_u:995: RV_06.048.20.2{04} devasya vāmaruto martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:996: RV_06.048.21.1{04} sadyaścid yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyāṃ devo naiti sūryaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:997: RV_06.048.21.2{04} tveṣaṃ śavo dadhire nāma yajñiyaṃ maruto vṛtrahaṃ śavo jyeṣṭhaṃ vṛtrahaṃ śavaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:998: RV_06.048.22.1{04} sakṛd dha dyaurajāyata sakṛd bhūmirajāyata
GV01rv_06_u:999: RV_06.048.22.2{04} pṛśnyā dugdhaṃ sakṛt payastadanyo nānu jāyate
GV01rv_06_u:1000: RV_06.049.01.1{05} stuṣe janaṃ suvrataṃ navyasībhirgīrbhirmitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā
GV01rv_06_u:1001: RV_06.049.01.2{05} ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantu sukṣatrāso varuṇomitro agniḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1003: RV_06.049.02.2{05} divaḥ śiśuṃ sahasaḥ sūnumagniṃ yajñasya ketumaruṣaṃ yajadhyai
GV01rv_06_u:1004: RV_06.049.03.1{05} aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhiranyā pipiśe sūro anyā
GV01rv_06_u:1005: RV_06.049.03.2{05} mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutaṃ nakṣata ṛcyamāne
GV01rv_06_u:1006: RV_06.049.04.1{05} pra vāyumachā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāraṃ rathaprām
GV01rv_06_u:1007: RV_06.049.04.2{05} dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavimiyakṣasi prayajyo
GV01rv_06_u:1008: RV_06.049.05.1{05} sa me vapuśchadayadaśvinoryo ratho virukmān manasā yujānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1009: RV_06.049.05.2{05} yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartiryāthastanayāya tmane ca
GV01rv_06_u:1010: RV_06.049.06.1{06} parjanyavātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatamapyāni
GV01rv_06_u:1011: RV_06.049.06.2{06} satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yasya gīrbhirjagata sthātarjagadākṛṇudhvam
GV01rv_06_u:1012: RV_06.049.07.1{06} pāvīravī kanyā citrāyuḥ sarasvatī vīrapatnī dhiyaṃ dhāt
GV01rv_06_u:1013: RV_06.049.07.2{06} gnābhirachidraṃ śaraṇaṃ sajoṣā durādharṣaṃ gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat
GV01rv_06_u:1014: RV_06.049.08.1{06} pathas-pathaḥ paripatiṃ vacasyā kāmena kṛto abhyānaḷ arkam
GV01rv_06_u:1015: RV_06.049.08.2{06} sa no rāsacchurudhaścandrāgrā dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā
GV01rv_06_u:1016: RV_06.049.09.1{06} prathamabhājaṃ yaśasaṃ vayodhāṃ supāṇiṃ devaṃ sugabhastim ṛbhvam
GV01rv_06_u:1017: RV_06.049.09.2{06} hotā yakṣad yajataṃ pastyānāmagnistvaṣṭāraṃ suhavaṃ vibhāvā
GV01rv_06_u:1018: RV_06.049.10.1{06} bhuvanasya pitaraṃ gīrbhirābhī rudraṃ divā vardhayā rudramaktau
GV01rv_06_u:1019: RV_06.049.10.2{06} bṛhantam ṛṣvamajaraṃ suṣumnam ṛdhag ghuvema kavineṣitāsaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1020: RV_06.049.11.1{07} ā yuvānaḥ kavayo yajñiyāso maruto ganta gṛṇato varasyām
GV01rv_06_u:1021: RV_06.049.11.2{07} acitraṃ cid dhi jinvathā vṛdhanta itthā nakṣanto naro aṅgirasvat
GV01rv_06_u:1022: RV_06.049.12.1{07} pra vīrāya pra tavase turāyājā yūtheva paśurakṣirastam
GV01rv_06_u:1023: RV_06.049.12.2{07} sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhirna nākaṃ vacanasyavipaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1024: RV_06.049.13.1{07} yo rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni triścid viṣṇurmanave bādhitāya
GV01rv_06_u:1025: RV_06.049.13.2{07} tasya te śarmannupadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca
GV01rv_06_u:1026: RV_06.049.14.1{07} tan no 'hirbudhnyo abdhirarkaistat parvatastat savitā cano dhāt
GV01rv_06_u:1027: RV_06.049.14.2{07} tadoṣadhībhirabhi rātiṣāco bhagaḥ purandhirjinvatu pra rāye
GV01rv_06_u:1028: RV_06.049.15.1{07} nu no rayiṃ rathyaṃ carṣaṇiprāṃ puruvīraṃ maha ṛtasya gopām
GV01rv_06_u:1029: RV_06.049.15.2{07} kṣayaṃ dātājaraṃ yena janān spṛdho adevīrabhi cakramāma viśa ādevīrabhyaśnavāma
GV01rv_06_u:1030: RV_06.050.01.1{08} huve vo devīmaditiṃ namobhirmṛḷīkāya varuṇaṃ mitramagnim
GV01rv_06_u:1031: RV_06.050.01.2{08} abhikṣadāmaryamaṇaṃ suśevaṃ trātṝn devān savitāraṃ bhagaṃ ca
GV01rv_06_u:1032: RV_06.050.02.1{08} sujyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣapitṝnanāgāstve sumaho vīhi devān
GV01rv_06_u:1033: RV_06.050.02.2{08} dvijanmāno ya ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvanto yajatā agnijihvāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1034: RV_06.050.03.1{08} uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatramuru bṛhad rodasī śaraṇaṃ suṣumne
GV01rv_06_u:1035: RV_06.050.03.2{08} mahas karatho varivo yathā no 'sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1036: RV_06.050.04.1{08} ā no rudrasya sūnavo namantāmadyā hūtāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1037: RV_06.050.04.2{08} yadīmarbhe mahati vā hitāso bādhe maruto ahvāma devān
GV01rv_06_u:1038: RV_06.050.05.1{08} mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardhayajvā
GV01rv_06_u:1039: RV_06.050.05.2{08} śrutvā havaṃ maruto yad dha yātha bhūmā rejante adhvani pravikte
GV01rv_06_u:1040: RV_06.050.06.1{09} abhi tyaṃ vīraṃ girvaṇasamarcendraṃ brahmaṇā jaritarnavena
GV01rv_06_u:1041: RV_06.050.06.2{09} śravadid dhavamupa ca stavāno rāsad vājānupa maho gṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1042: RV_06.050.07.1{09} omānamāpo mānuṣīramṛktaṃ dhāta tokāya tanayāya śaṃyoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1043: RV_06.050.07.2{09} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā bhiṣajo mātṛtamā viśvasya sthāturjagato janitrīḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1044: RV_06.050.08.1{09} ā no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇo hiraṇyapāṇiryajato jagamyāt
GV01rv_06_u:1045: RV_06.050.08.2{09} yo datravānuṣaso na pratīkaṃ vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi
GV01rv_06_u:1046: RV_06.050.09.1{09} uta tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adyā devānasminnadhvare vavṛtyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1047: RV_06.050.09.2{09} syāmahaṃ te sadamid rātau tava syāmagne 'vasā suvīraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1048: RV_06.050.10.1{09} uta tyā me havamā jagmyātaṃ nāsatyā dhībhiryuvamaṅga viprā
GV01rv_06_u:1049: RV_06.050.10.2{09} atriṃ na mahastamaso 'mumuktaṃ tūrvataṃ narā duritādabhīke
GV01rv_06_u:1050: RV_06.050.11.1{10} te no rāyo dyumato vājavato dātāro bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1051: RV_06.050.11.2{10} daśasyanto divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā apyā mṛlatā cadevāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1052: RV_06.050.12.1{10} te no rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣā mīḷhuṣmanto viṣṇurmṛḷantu vāyuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1053: RV_06.050.12.2{10} ṛbhukṣā vājo daivyo vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyatāmiṣaṃ naḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1054: RV_06.050.13.1{10} uta sya devaḥ savitā bhago no 'pāṃ napādavatu dānu papriḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1055: RV_06.050.13.2{10} tvaṣṭā devebhirjanibhiḥ sajoṣā dyaurdevebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1056: RV_06.050.14.1{10} uta no 'hirbudhnyaḥ śṛṇotvaja ekapāt pṛthivī samudraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1057: RV_06.050.14.2{10} viśve devā ṛtāvṛdho huvānā stutā mantrāḥ kaviśastā avantu
GV01rv_06_u:1058: RV_06.050.15.1{10} evā napāto mama tasya dhībhirbharadvājā abhyarcantyarkaiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1059: RV_06.050.15.2{10} gnā hutāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭā viśve stutāso bhūtā yajatrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1060: RV_06.051.01.1{11} udu tyaccakṣurmahi mitrayorāneti priyaṃ varuṇayoradabdham
GV01rv_06_u:1061: RV_06.051.01.2{11} ṛtasya śuci darśatamanīkaṃ rukmo na diva uditāvyadyaut
GV01rv_06_u:1062: RV_06.051.02.1{11} veda yastrīṇi vidathānyeṣāṃ devānāṃ janma sanutarā ca vipraḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1063: RV_06.051.02.2{11} ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyannabhi caṣṭe sūro arya evān
GV01rv_06_u:1064: RV_06.051.03.1{11} stuṣa u vo maha ṛtasya gopānaditiṃ mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sujātān
GV01rv_06_u:1065: RV_06.051.03.2{11} aryamaṇaṃ bhagamadabdhadhītīnachā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān
GV01rv_06_u:1066: RV_06.051.04.1{11} riśādasaḥ satpatīnradabdhān maho rājñaḥ suvasanasya dātṝn
GV01rv_06_u:1067: RV_06.051.04.2{11} yūnaḥ sukṣatrān kṣayato divo nṝnādityān yāmyaditiṃ duvoyu
GV01rv_06_u:1068: RV_06.051.05.1{11} dyauṣ pitaḥ pṛthivi mātaradhrugagne bhrātarvasavo mṛḷatā naḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1069: RV_06.051.05.2{11} viśva ādityā adite sajoṣā asmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yanta
GV01rv_06_u:1070: RV_06.051.06.1{12} mā no vṛkāya vṛkye samasmā aghāyate rīradhatā yajatrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1071: RV_06.051.06.2{12} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā rathyo nastanūnāṃ yūyaṃ dakṣasya vacaso babhūva
GV01rv_06_u:1072: RV_06.051.07.1{12} mā va eno anyakṛtaṃ bhujema mā tat karma vasavo yaccayadhve
GV01rv_06_u:1073: RV_06.051.07.2{12} viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśvadevāḥ svayaṃ ripustanvaṃ rīriṣīṣṭa
GV01rv_06_u:1074: RV_06.051.08.1{12} nama idugraṃ nama ā vivāse namo dādhāra pṛthivīmuta dyām
GV01rv_06_u:1075: RV_06.051.08.2{12} namo devebhyo nama īśa eṣāṃ kṛtaṃ cideno namasāvivāse
GV01rv_06_u:1076: RV_06.051.09.1{12} ṛtasya vo rathyaḥ pūtadakṣān ṛtasya pastyasado adabdhān
GV01rv_06_u:1077: RV_06.051.09.2{12} tānā namobhirurucakṣaso nṝn viśvān va ā name maho yajatrāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1078: RV_06.051.10.1{12} te hi śreṣṭhavarcasasta u nastiro viśvāni duritā nayanti
GV01rv_06_u:1079: RV_06.051.10.2{12} sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agnir{ṛ}tadhītayo vakmarājasatyāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1080: RV_06.051.11.1{13} te na indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhago aditiḥ pañca janāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1081: RV_06.051.11.2{13} suśarmāṇaḥ svavasaḥ sunīthā bhavantu naḥsutrātrāsaḥ sugopāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1082: RV_06.051.12.1{13} nū sadmānaṃ divyaṃ naṃśi devā bhāradvājaḥ sumatiṃ yāti hotā
GV01rv_06_u:1084: RV_06.051.13.1{13} apa tyaṃ vṛjinaṃ ripuṃ stenamagne durādhyam
GV01rv_06_u:1086: RV_06.051.14.1{13} grāvāṇaḥ soma no hi kaṃ sakhitvanāya vāvaśuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1087: RV_06.051.14.2{13} jahī nyatriṇaṃ paṇiṃ vṛko hi ṣaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1088: RV_06.051.15.1{13} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1089: RV_06.051.15.2{13} kartā no adhvannā sugaṃ gopā amā
GV01rv_06_u:1091: RV_06.051.16.2{13} yena viśvāḥ paridviṣo vṛṇakti vindate vasu
GV01rv_06_u:1092: RV_06.052.01.1{14} na tad divā na pṛthivyānu manye na yajñena nota śamībhirābhiḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1093: RV_06.052.01.2{14} ubjantu taṃ subhvaḥ parvatāso ni hīyatāmatiyājasya yaṣṭā
GV01rv_06_u:1094: RV_06.052.02.1{14} ati vā yo maruto manyate no brahma vā yaḥ kriyamāṇaṃ ninitsāt
GV01rv_06_u:1095: RV_06.052.02.2{14} tapūṃṣi tasmai vṛjināni santu brahmadviṣamabhi taṃ śocatu dyauḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1096: RV_06.052.03.1{14} kimaṅga tvā brahmaṇaḥ soma gopāṃ kimaṅga tvāhurabhiśastipāṃ naḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1097: RV_06.052.03.2{14} kimaṅga naḥ paśyasi nidyamānān brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetimasya
GV01rv_06_u:1098: RV_06.052.04.1{14} avantu māmuṣaso jāyamānā avantu mā sindhavaḥ pinvamānāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1099: RV_06.052.04.2{14} avantu mā parvatāso dhruvāso 'vantu mā pitaro devahūtau
GV01rv_06_u:1100: RV_06.052.05.1{14} viśvadānīṃ sumanasaḥ syāma paśyema nu sūryamuccarantam
GV01rv_06_u:1102: RV_06.052.06.1{15} indro nediṣṭhamavasāgamiṣṭhaḥ sarasvatī sindhubhiḥ pinvamānā
GV01rv_06_u:1103: RV_06.052.06.2{15} parjanyo na oṣadhībhirmayobhuragniḥ suśaṃsaḥ suhavaḥ piteva
GV01rv_06_u:1104: RV_06.052.07.1{15} viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam
GV01rv_06_u:1106: RV_06.052.08.1{15} yo vo devā ghṛtasnunā havyena pratibhūṣati
GV01rv_06_u:1108: RV_06.052.09.1{15} upa naḥ sūnavo giraḥ śṛṇvantvamṛtasya ye
GV01rv_06_u:1114: RV_06.052.12.1{16} imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ hotarvayunaśo yaja
GV01rv_06_u:1116: RV_06.052.13.1{16} viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ havaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upa dyavi ṣṭha
GV01rv_06_u:1117: RV_06.052.13.2{16} ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam
GV01rv_06_u:1118: RV_06.052.14.1{16} viśve devā mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyā ubhe rodasī apāṃ napācca manma
GV01rv_06_u:1119: RV_06.052.14.2{16} mā vo vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocaṃ sumneṣvid vo antamā madema
GV01rv_06_u:1120: RV_06.052.15.1{16} ye ke ca jmā mahino ahimāyā divo jajñire apāṃ sadhasthe
GV01rv_06_u:1121: RV_06.052.15.2{16} te asmabhyamiṣaye viśvamāyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantudevāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1122: RV_06.052.16.1{16} agnīparjanyāvavataṃ dhiyaṃ me 'smin have suhavā suṣṭutiṃnaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1123: RV_06.052.16.2{16} iḷāmanyo janayad garbhamanyaḥ prajāvatīriṣa ā dhattamasme
GV01rv_06_u:1124: RV_06.052.17.1{16} stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau sūktena mahā namasā vivāse
GV01rv_06_u:1125: RV_06.052.17.2{16} asmin no adya vidathe yajatrā viśve devā haviṣi mādayadhvam
GV01rv_06_u:1126: RV_06.053.01.1{17} vayamu tvā pathas pate rathaṃ na vājasātaye
GV01rv_06_u:1128: RV_06.053.02.1{17} abhi no naryaṃ vasu vīraṃ prayatadakṣiṇam
GV01rv_06_u:1130: RV_06.053.03.1{17} aditsantaṃ cidāghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya
GV01rv_06_u:1132: RV_06.053.04.1{17} vi patho vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdho jahi
GV01rv_06_u:1134: RV_06.053.05.1{17} pari tṛndhi paṇīnāmārayā hṛdayā kave
GV01rv_06_u:1136: RV_06.053.06.1{18} vi pūṣannārayā tuda paṇericha hṛdi priyam
GV01rv_06_u:1138: RV_06.053.07.1{18} ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnāṃ hṛdayā kave
GV01rv_06_u:1141: RV_06.053.08.2{18} tayā samasya hṛdayamā rikha kikirā kṛṇu
GV01rv_06_u:1142: RV_06.053.09.1{18} yā te aṣṭrā goopaśāghṛṇe paśusādhanī
GV01rv_06_u:1144: RV_06.053.10.1{18} uta no goṣaṇiṃ dhiyamaśvasāṃ vājasāmuta
GV01rv_06_u:1146: RV_06.054.01.1{19} saṃ pūṣan viduṣā naya yo añjasānuśāsati
GV01rv_06_u:1148: RV_06.054.02.1{19} samu pūṣṇā gamemahi yo gṛhānabhiśāsati
GV01rv_06_u:1150: RV_06.054.03.1{19} pūṣṇaścakraṃ na riṣyati na kośo 'va padyate
GV01rv_06_u:1152: RV_06.054.04.1{19} yo asmai haviṣāvidhan na taṃ pūṣāpi mṛṣyate
GV01rv_06_u:1154: RV_06.054.05.1{19} pūṣā gā anvetu naḥ puṣā rakṣatvarvataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1156: RV_06.054.06.1{20} pūṣannanu pra gā ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1158: RV_06.054.07.1{20} mākirneśan mākīṃ riṣan mākīṃ saṃ śāri kevaṭe
GV01rv_06_u:1162: RV_06.054.09.1{20} pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana
GV01rv_06_u:1164: RV_06.054.10.1{20} pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam
GV01rv_06_u:1166: RV_06.055.01.1{21} ehi vāṃ vimuco napādāghṛṇe saṃ sacāvahai
GV01rv_06_u:1176: RV_06.055.06.1{21} ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ rathe niśṛmbhāste janaśriyam
GV01rv_06_u:1180: RV_06.056.02.1{22} uta ghā sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatiryujā
GV01rv_06_u:1182: RV_06.056.03.1{22} utādaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraścakraṃ hiraṇyayam
GV01rv_06_u:1184: RV_06.056.04.1{22} yadadya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1185: RV_06.056.04.2{22} tat su no manma sādhaya
GV01rv_06_u:1186: RV_06.056.05.1{22} imaṃ ca no gaveṣaṇaṃ sātaye sīṣadho gaṇam
GV01rv_06_u:1189: RV_06.056.06.2{22} adyā ca sarvatātaye śvaśca sarvatātaye
GV01rv_06_u:1190: RV_06.057.01.1{23} indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayaṃ sakhyāya svastaye
GV01rv_06_u:1192: RV_06.057.02.1{23} somamanya upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam
GV01rv_06_u:1194: RV_06.057.03.1{23} ajā anyasya vahnayo harī anyasya sambhṛtā
GV01rv_06_u:1196: RV_06.057.04.1{23} yadindro anayad rito mahīrapo vṛṣantamaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1198: RV_06.057.05.1{23} tāṃ pūṣṇaḥ sumatiṃ vayaṃ vṛkṣasya pra vayāmiva
GV01rv_06_u:1202: RV_06.058.01.1{24} śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaurivāsi
GV01rv_06_u:1203: RV_06.058.01.2{24} viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣanniharātirastu
GV01rv_06_u:1204: RV_06.058.02.1{24} ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyaṃjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1205: RV_06.058.02.2{24} aṣṭrāṃ pūṣā śithirāmudvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇobhuvanā deva īyate
GV01rv_06_u:1206: RV_06.058.03.1{24} yāste pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīrantarikṣe caranti
GV01rv_06_u:1207: RV_06.058.03.2{24} tābhiryāsi dūtyāṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛta śrava ichamānaḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1208: RV_06.058.04.1{24} pūṣā subandhurdiva ā pṛthivyā iḷas patirmaghavā dasmavarcāḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1209: RV_06.058.04.2{24} yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam
GV01rv_06_u:1210: RV_06.059.01.1{25} pra nu vocā suteṣu vāṃ vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ
GV01rv_06_u:1211: RV_06.059.01.2{25} hatāso vāṃ pitaro devaśatrava indrāgnī jīvatho yuvam
GV01rv_06_u:1212: RV_06.059.02.1{25} baḷ itthā mahimā vāmindrāgnī paniṣṭha ā
GV01rv_06_u:1213: RV_06.059.02.2{25} samāno vāṃ janitā bhrātarā yuvaṃ yamāvihehamātarā
GV01rv_06_u:1214: RV_06.059.03.1{25} okivāṃsā sute sacānaśvā saptī ivādane
